company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
• Support the bank to achieve unsecured loan portfolio
• Monitor loan collection process and gather information of defaulters to evaluate the causes and proper classification of NPL to take action effectively
• Lead recovery team to communicate with delinquent borrowers, establish and develop effective payment plans with delinquent borrowers. (include cooperation with loan officers)
• Negotiate and find resolution with defaulters outside court complied to bank policy
• Advice borrowers of their legal liabilities under existing contract law (including the interpretation of their liability under the loan agreement)
• Liaise with compliance team/lawyers on litigation cases until the cases are closed
• Submit the litigation cases to the judge
• Attend Court to meet with the Judges whenever required
• Follow up legal settlement process and make sure it effectively and efficiently with internal and external lawyer firm
• Cooperation with assessment team with Conducting site visit and Report to assessment team with recommendation and proposed repayment method of the overdue clients
• Other duties and responsibilities that Management may assigned from time to time
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor or degree equivalent in Banking and Finance, and law or related field.
• At least 5-year experiences in the banking industry or related field.
• Able to communicate well in English
• Strong negotiation and problem-solving skills
• Attention to details.
• Good level of computer program (MS. Word & Excel).
• Good understanding of business process.
• Committed, patient and able to work under pressure
• Quick learner on policies, procedures and credit processes
• Have good interpersonal communication skill, team work, independent, conflict
management resolution, result-oriented; ability work without supervision under pressure.
• Ability appropriately effectively solve problem by showing good problem
solving negotiation with levels various situations; good interpersonal communication.
• Be integrity, accountability, commitment strong compassion towards with poor the
institution strong social mission;
• Be highly committed work under pressure be willing frequently
travel place across provinces/cities chase up migrated overdue loan partners/clients;

Job Description:

• Enforce the relevant safety rules at site and make sure personal protective equipment is worn as and where required by the staff under their responsibility
• Evaluate and resolve any discrepancies and problems arising during construction which affect the quality of works performed
• Conduct regular inspections and assess the work performance done by all subcontractors
• Organize and provide technical support of technical staff on structural engineering and construction matters.
• Provide technical support to other site team members.
• Contribute or otherwise assist as required

• Bachelor Degree in Civil Engineering or related field
• 1 years’ experience in construction site
• Knowledge of Project management, Safety management
• Knowledge of Problem solving at site
• Can use Microsoft office (Word, Excel Power point), Auto CAD and Microsoft project is priority 
• Can use English language both speaking and writing 
• Ability to work under pressure.
• Strong Respond with working.

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority pay, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. company_name: Borey Sieng Hong បុរី សៀង ហុង
Job Description:
Duties & Responsibilities:

• Provide administrative and secretarial support to teams
• Identify and follow up on further documentation needed
• Assist with general administrative and clerical tasks such as answering phones and mailing
• Addresses any issues and concerns in a timely manner
• Remind management of important tasks and deadlines
• Respond accurately to internal and external information requests
• Coordinate with both internal departments and external parties
• Provide personal assistance to management
• Ensure business confidentiality at all times
• Arranges meeting appointments
• Overviews documents before submitting for approval
• Performs other tasks as assigned by the management
Job Requirement:
Qualification & Requirement:

• Graduated associate or BBA degree in Business Administration, Business Management, Marketing, or related field.
• More than 1-year experience in Management Role
• Proficient in Microsoft Office tools including project, Word Excel Outlook,
• Excellent time management and organizational skills
• Independent judgment and decision-making ability
• Excellent communication skill, negotiation skill, and leadership skill
• Action-oriented and results-driven
• Extensive knowledge of Sales Planning, Understanding the Customer, Product Development, Client Relationships, Creative Services
• Possess strong problem solving, interpersonal, and Competitive analytical skills.

Interest applicants are invited to submit their updated CV, state the position applied for, and attach a current photo (4X6) along with relevant documents to Sienghonghr@gmail.com
Company Profile:
Borey Sieng Hong is a real estate company with a head office along National street 51, Kandal. Our company’s goal is to serve and provide Cambodian people with high standard and quality properties. Aiming for out-standing care and service, the company thrives to provide nothing but the best in the market for our valued customers. 

Our company is looking to recruit highly motivated star employees who are passionate about the real estate industry. An individual with an enthusiastic personality, a strong work ethic, and remarkable creativity. A team of Exceptional interpersonal and organizational abilities to help the company grow and expand in the industry.

Here at Sieng Hong, we offer a great career path and learning opportunities.

We would like to hear from you and have you as part of our family.

Job Description:
-	Ensure competent quality execution of all regular purchasing duties and administrative works.
-	Maintain complete updated purchasing records/data and pricing in the system.
-	Schedule store visits and conduct competitor survey.
-	Coordinate with user departments and suppliers in the purchasing scope of work for projects assigned.
-	Support relevant departments with quotations for the purpose of tenders.
-	Coordinate with suppliers to ensure on-time delivery.
-	Responsible for the preparation and process purchase orders and documents in accordance with company policies and procedures.
-	Monitor and co-ordinate deliveries of items between suppliers to ensure that all items are delivered to site on time.

-	Select and negotiate for the best purchase package in terms of quality, price, terms, deliveries and services with suppliers.

-	Good oral and written communication skills.
-	Good Command in English

-	Experience in import/export or Forwarding Company is advantage.
-	Willing to travel and work in provinces.

Job Description: Position OverviewBoth Full Time and Part Time positions are available for a motivated General Nurse at our site in Palelai 1 Village, Poipet Commune, Poypet district, Banteay Meanchey Province, Cambodia.The successful nurse must be willing to participate in a 24-hour roster. The general nurse will have a history of actively participating in the sharing of knowledge, will have a willingness to participate in team activities, a history of patient care at a high standard, and will have an understanding of Medical Ethics and Clinical Practice Standards. The ideal applicant will also demonstrate a desire to undertake independent learning to improve knowledge, clinical skills, interpersonal communication skills, professionalism, and customer service.The applicant must be willing to abide by and have knowledge of, the regulations as outlined in the Neak Tep Elegant Clinic Internal Regulations, and the Cambodian Labour Law.All shortlisted applicants must provide copies of their Credentials, References, and will be required to attend an Interview with Neak Tep Elegant Clinic Management.Job Description•	Demonstrate and participate in teamwork •	Undertake nurse responsibilities in consultation with Medical Staff•	Perform any X Rays, ECGs when requested by the doctor•	Carry out an initial assessment with all patients•	Assists with the insertion of an IV Catheter, blood collection, and IV fluid administration•	Perform minor procedures and wound dressing•	Liaise with pathology to ensure correct information is transferred to and from pathology when requested to do so by Medical Staff•	Liaise with the Laboratory, Physiotherapy Department, General Surgery Department, and  external health services for patient referral •	Keep all work areas clean, tidy, and hygienically safe•	Undertake your daily responsibilities of caring for equipment as instructed by the nurse leader•	Responsible for administering medication when rostered to do so•	First point of contact for all patients, demonstrating a high standard of customer service•	Hand over patient information to incoming nurses at the change of shift•	Demonstrate motivation at work and good communication•	Abide by rostered hours including night-time on-call duties•	Respect and abide by Neak Tep Elegant Clinic policies
Job Requirement: - Hold a Bachelor of Nursing recognized by Cambodian Ministry of Education or recognised international Health Service.- Applicants should be no older than 50 years of age.- Willing to learn, improve knowledge and continue learning- Available for flexible working hours, able to work day and night shifts on rational basis- Have at least one year of post graduate clinical experience- Ability to build good inter-personal relationships- Good command of English (written/spoken/comprehension)- Computer literacy- Able to actively participate in a team environment How to applyAll applicants should send their Curriculum Vitae, Cover Letter, and copies of relevant education certificates to the Neak Tep Elegant Clinic Human Resource Team:- via email: hr@neaktepclinic.com- via post: Neak Tep Hospital, 7 Makara St, Chun Lung Village, Sangkat Sala Kamroeuk, Krong Siem Reap, Cambodia, Kingdom of Cambodia.- Contact Telephone: 089 529 159/098 529 159
Contact Info: Contact Information Mao Ravuth  089 529 159 / 098 529 159 7 Makara Str., Chunlong Village, Sangkat Sala Kamreuk, Siem Reap, Cambodia  089 529 159 / 098 529 159

Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.

job title: Executive, Project Sales (ready mixed concrete & Chinese speaking)
position: Executive, Project Sales (ready mixed concrete & Chinese speaking)
Job Description:
Summary of Position
Responsible for collecting data and providing recommendation of market improvement.  Working and supporting customers to ensure that product is safely delivered on time through good communication with all parties.

What you will do:
•	Monitor and control individual sales to achieve yearly target assigned by supervisor
•	Partner with other departments (Quality Control, Production Operations, Transportation, Dispatch, etc.) to ensure every account receives appropriate level of customer service as well as discuss new ideas and product segmentation plans
•	Provide good quality of products and services to customers through communication with all parties
•	Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales
•	Report all unsafe conditions or behaviors on the job or yard
•	Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Business Management or other related fields.
•	At least 2 years of experience in Sales
•	Be able to speak Mandarin Chinese
•	Demonstrated ability to identify new business in alignment with company strategy
•	Solid project management skills to gather and analyze customer insight research, develop and design marketing strategies and implement campaigns
•	Proven leadership skills combined with strong communications and interpersonal skills

What we offer:
We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

Company Profile:
ABOUT COMPANY
(Cambodia) Power Transmission Lines Co., Ltd is a single-purpose company set up to develop a transmission network in Northwestern Cambodia. The Project undertaken on a 30-year Build-Operate-Transfer (BOT) basis with the Government of Cambodia transmits power supply from Thailand to the 3 provinces of Banteay Meanchey, Siem Reap and Battambang. The transmission network principally consists of 221km of 115kV transmission lines with 4 substations and 1 switching station. It is part of the National Grid for North Western Cambodia and the future Greater Mekong Sub-Region (GMS)
interconnection network.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description

Duties and Job Responsibility
-Seeds Garment (Cambodia) Co., Ltd is the international garment factory based in Hong Kong.

-Interview arrangement.

-Do other work as required by superior.

Company Profile:
ABOUT COMPANY
(Cambodia) Power Transmission Lines Co., Ltd is a single-purpose company set up to develop a transmission network in Northwestern Cambodia. The Project undertaken on a 30-year Build-Operate-Transfer (BOT) basis with the Government of Cambodia transmits power supply from Thailand to the 3 provinces of Banteay Meanchey, Siem Reap and Battambang. The transmission network principally consists of 221km of 115kV transmission lines with 4 substations and 1 switching station. It is part of the National Grid for North Western Cambodia and the future Greater Mekong Sub-Region (GMS)
interconnection network.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

• Reconciling processed work by verifying entries vs reports.
• Maintaining historical records.
• Paying employees by verifying expense reports and preparing pay checks.
• Paying vendors by scheduling pay checks and ensuring payment is received for outstanding credit; generally responding to all vendor enquiries regarding finance.
• Preparing analyses of accounts and producing monthly reports
• Renew Work Permit/Contract for all the employees annually
• Coordinate to get Patent Tax and Import/Export Basel permit annually.
• Communicate with Regional Offices
• Other tasks assigned by Manager

Job Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in finance or Accounting or related fields.
• At least 2-3-year experience in Accounting and Admin fields.
• Basic knowledge of Accounts
• Good personal relation, self-motivated, and commitment
• Flexibility and ability to work under pressure
• Proficiency in computer skills (QuickBooks, MS office, Internet, and E-mail)
• Good Communication in English
• Honest and Hard working.

Kandal Province.

Company Profile:
TES-AMM is a leading electronics waste recycler, currently serving clients on a global basis and working with a variety of clients, ranging from OEMs, CEMs, repair and servicing companies to logistics providers, electronics waste brokers, Local Authorities and National Environmental Agencies.

As a recycler, we at TES-AMM recognize the complexity of environmental legislation our clients are facing. Job Description:
I. Main Duties and Responsibilities
- Coordinate all admissions to the school
- To keep the head of school and PYP Coordinator informed on Admissions
- Keep Administration department updated with admissions information
- Keep up to date with the PYP curriculum and inform new parents about the program
- Make contact with other international schools to expand our school intake
- Coordinate all pupil admissions to the school including: initial contact ,sending out prospectus, and ensuring inserts updated
- Arranging initial visits and tour
- Coordinating taster days
- Ensuring all registration, acceptance forms and joining details are accurately completed and collect monies due in conjunction with the receptionist
- Following up of all admissions enquiries
- To organize and distributing surveys for parents and pupils as required
- To send annual prospectus to relocation agents and foster a good relationship with them
- Attend planning meetings as required
- In conjunction with the PYP Coordinator, maintain and develop the school database for pupils, staff and circulate contact details as required
- Update and distribute class lists monthly, or as required and regularly update pupil numbers and other statistical data for Head of school, PYP Coordinator and Admin Manager
- Keep all documentation/records up-to-date and in order
- Annual update of Student Handbook and other literature
- To carry out duties as assigned by the Head of school or Chairman
- Attend professional development courses as required
- Attend all school activities and events, help to organize and carry out any other reasonable requests from the Admin or Academic office
- Substitute teacher where needed
- Develop program and projects for international student exchange trips and extra-curricular activities
- Develop strategies to increase expat student intake.
Job Requirement:
II. Requirements
- Master or bachelor degree in education or relevant certificate;
- At least a years professional knowledge & experience in advance external affair and admission
- Excellent communication & analysis skill
- Good command in Ms-office and email
- Be able to respond well to multi- tasks and pressure
- Good problem-solving skill
- Easy going, friendly, helpful, honest, patient, and hard working.

Job Description:
I. Main Duties and Responsibilities
A- Administration
- Administer employment agreements including others internal and external contract agreement, and maintain leave; benefit and attendant system and procedure.
- Identify and manage appropriate courses of action for performance and disciplinary issues including issue warn letters and termination letter.
- Manage the repair and maintenance of computer and office equipment including building maintenance and ensure it in safe and clean environment.
- Maintain and manage school bus to ensure school delivery service perform smoothly and effectively.
- Manage the filing, storage and security of documents and keep it up to date.
- Coordinate with DHOS (Administrative) to manage staff and teachers to ensure all activities are achieved following guidelines and protocol and there is compliance of all internal control and audit requirements at all times as well as with Cambodia law.
- Receive and stamp all in or out letters, mails and correspondences and distribute as directed fax, post office, hand delivery and email.
- Prepare outgoing mail for local or overseas delivery or post office
- Route and file correspondence, documents and other materials according to established filing system and maintain confidentiality.
- Monitor fixed assets; checking inventory lists.

B- Human Resources
- Post the staff recruitment and hiring on any visibilities channel to ensure approachable to potential candidates;
- Orient and coordinate and facilitate in training employees, and developing personal growth opportunities;
- Assist to develop job description to ensure staff have clear definitions of role responsibilities and accountabilities and clearly understand their performance goals in order to support the delivery of school strategic objectives;
- Prepare and recommending policies (i.e. personnel policies, student policies, compensation policies, etc.) and ensure all policies and procedures are adhered to, and be aware of and adhere to the Health and Safety policies and procedures;
- Appraise staff under own supervision for the probation period and the contract review annually.
Job Requirement:
II. REQUIREMENTS
- Having a good management skill;
- Be good at both English and Khmer, and good communication will be preferred,
- Preferably one or two years supervisory level of similar job scope,
- Sound knowledge of proficient in Microsoft Office Application, good command of spoken and writing English,
- Honest, sincere, trustworthy, tidy, alert, figures literate, hard-working, cooperate, initiative, responsible and a team player activity to prioritize works to meet targets.

Job Description:
I. Main Duties and Responsibilities
1. Serve as a source of information for and as a facilitator of communication between parents, teachers and staff members.
2. Enroll and orient new students and families.
3. Support special needs students as well as students with exceptional abilities.
4. Serve as building assessment coordinators.
5. Coordinates communication between the Building Intervention Team and general education teachers.
6. Teach classroom counseling lessons on a wide range of developmentally appropriate topics including goal setting, communication, technology use, character education and peer conflict.
7. Conduct several “Parent Coffee with Counselors” for 4/5 parents and for 6-8 parents throughout the year.
8. Assist in transition activities for students entering the upper elementary, the middle school and those moving on to the high school.
9. Monitor academic progress and facilitating the Maximizing of Academic Potential for all students.
10. Provide information and referrals to parents on outside personal and academic resources and support services available.
11. Help students attain an optimum level of personal and social adjustment.
12. Consult with students, parents, teachers and other school and community personnel to assist in meeting the needs of students
13. Facilitate the development of Educational Development Plans for all students.
14. Provide individual counseling and group guidance to help students cope effectively personal, social, academic, career, and family concerns.
Job Requirement:
II. REQUIREMENTS
1. Native Speaker
2. Master or bachelor degree in education or relevant certificate
3. Effective communication skills, relationship building skills 
4. Instructional techniques; human behaviour, development, and skill performance
5. Ability to build effective relationships with students understanding that this is at the core of a successful student/teacher relationship
6. Ability to problem solves and manages priorities.

Job Description:
- Develop product policy for deposits, remittances, related operational rules and review other Personal Banking products at regular intervals.

- Review personal banking account opening policy and risk control measures.
- Assist in establishing review and control measures for Personal Banking products and collate findings for reporting into internal compliance department.
- Analyze product data and devise local strategy with sub-branches for business growth and operational streamlining.

Job Description:

វិស្វករការងារថែមថយសំណង់ ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្ម និងស្វែងរកនូវដំណោះស្រាយអោយបានល្អបំផុតដើម្បីបំពេញតម្រូវការ និងការស្នើសុំរបស់អតិថិជន។

2. ទំនួលខុសត្រូវ:

- រៀបចំឯកសារដែលអតិថិជនស្នើសុំដូចជា ឯកសារសំយ៉ាប ឯកសារអំពែភ្លើង ធ្វើលិខិតអនុញ្ញាតនាំជាងចូលសាងសង់;  
- គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ និងឯកសារការងារថែមថយ រៀបចំប្លង់សម្រាប់ជួបអតិថិជន ធ្វើរបាយការណប្រចាំថ្ងៃបញ្ចូលការងារថែមថយ ចូលក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធជាប្រចាំ;
- ស្កេនឯកសារទៅការដ្ឋាន និងផ្ញើអ៊ីម៉េលជាប្រចាំទៅផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- ចុះតាមដានការងារនាំជាងចូល និងការងារថែមថយតាមការដ្ឋានជាប្រចាំ
-​ ការងារផ្សេងៗត្រូវបានចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
3. គុណវុឌ្ឍិ:

-​ បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែក សំណង់ វិស្វកម្មអគ្គិសនី និងទឹក ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម​ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មិនមានបទពិសោធន៍ក៏អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន
- ជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ Autocad 2D និង Sketchup
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានគួរសម
- អាចគ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារបាន
- មានភាពបត់បែនជាមួយនឹងការងារ ក្រុមការងារ និងអតិថិជន
- ជំនាញក្នុងការចរចារ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ព្រមទាំងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់

4. ថ្ងៃ និង ម៉ោងបម្រើការងារ:

-​ ពីថ្ងៃ ចន្ទ ដល់ ថ្ងៃ សៅរ៍ ពេលព្រឹក
- ម៉ោង ០៨.០០ ព្រឹក ដល់ ម៉ោង ១២.០០ ថ្ងៃត្រង់ និង ម៉ោង ០១.០០ រសៀល ដល់ ម៉ោង ០៥.០០ រសៀល
- សម្រាកអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់ ម៉ោង ១២.០០ ថ្ងៃត្រង់ ដល់ ម៉ោង ០១.០០ រសៀល

5. ទីតាំងបម្រើការងារ:

-វិស្វករការងារថែមថយសំណង់ មានទីតាំងប្រចាំនៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាល បុរី ប៉េង ហួត។

6. ទំនាក់ទំនងការងារ:

- វិស្វករការងារថែមថយសំណង់ រាយការណ៍ផ្ទាល់ទៅកាន់ ប្រធានក្រុមថែមថយជាន់ខ្ពស់។ 

7. ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖

- ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ (អាចចរចារបាន)
- ប្រាក់រង្វាន់បំណាច់ឆ្នាំរហូតដល់ ៣០០ភាគរយ
- ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍
- ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ការឧបត្ថម្ភទៅលើការសិក្សា
- ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាំងក្នុង និងក្រៅ
- ផ្តល់តំលៃពិសេសសំរាប់ការទិញផ្ទះ

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ អាចរៀបចំប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប ព្រឹត្តិបត្តិពិន្ទុ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ រូបថត ៤x៦ និងបញ្ជាក់ពីតួនាទីដែលចាប់អារម្មណ៍ រួចផ្ញើរមកកាន់អាសយដ្ឋាន ៖

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
Play a role as receptionist:
• When patient is arrived, Check ID Card, Check in, Print Treatment forms and find patient file.
• For new patient, ask patient to complete form first then register to create a new file for patient, check in and print treatment form.
• Both of action above is done then take patient with file to Nurse to take vital sign, brief chief complaint and the nurse take patient to see doctor.

Cashier:

• First verify Prescription with the file and system, make sure that is all are correct then print invoice for patient to sign for staff free, for cash payment print invoice for patient to sign and received cash.
• After seeing doctor, get medications, invoice payment sign check out patient.
• All cash received for all day have to pay to Bursar and sign received note from them.
• Hold cash float $100 for exchange in daily operation, this cash is kept in closed locker and secure place.

Insurance Patient:

• Scan Patient ID Card and print to keep in file.
• Write down in the insurance form describe about the accident, what does it happen, time, place and all kind of injury, fracture…etc.
• Print invoice for patient sign all time when patient seen by doctor.
• When the patient insurance is closed must total al the payment and issue to Bursar.

Patients file:

• Check for all patient who has seen doctor today organized file in the chat and keep in the file room.
• Check for all stationary, request to refill stock.
• Check for all patient form and copy for making a new file.
• All new patient file who is seen by doctor, print patient code to attach to file, making a new file chart then keep in the file room by swift numbers easy to find next time.  

Patients Care:
• Process patients into the Student Health Center.
• Triage patient when she/he arrived to Student Health Center.
• In case patient in not urgent or not emergency let patient wait to consult with doctor.
• In case the patient is in urgent or emergent let patient lie down in the bed, take vital sign brief chief complaint write in the chart and calling to see doctor first and complete process to help patient as soon as possible.
• For patient is not urgent or emergency, Help patient to complete patient form for new patient.
• Ask patient history, does she/he has any severe allergy with medication or food.
• Register patient’s information in to database and in the patient’s chat.
• Take vital sign, Chief Complaint, weight and high then calling to doctor to consult with patient by phone and provide treatment. 
• In case patient has accident and injuries, clean wound and do other procedure for patient.
• In case patient has trauma or fracture need to do bandage to prevent immobilization and transfer to Central MTT-SHC for further management and treatment.
• While patient in SHC, administer Medication for patient and observation as doctor’s advice.
• Nursing note and documentation in the patient note.
• Observe vital sign intake and output in case patient has vomiting, diarrhea and high fever.
• Assist patient as needed (Sponge bath to reduce fever, to bathroom, or walking…etc.). 
• To be flexible and quickly to help patient setting.
• Clean and organize all medical supplies and hand washing before and after touching patient to be prevention Nosocomial infection.
• Organize patient bed and keeping the patient’s area clean and tidy.
•  Clean and Control clinic environment in the SHC is always cleaned and hygiene.   

Pharmacy:

• Dispensary medication by doctor’s prescription and explains to patients to use for the right way at home 
•  Organize medication in the Medication Cabinet by alphabet, check for expired date, Stock control, physical count, amount of medication every week to verify with stock in database. 
•  Request order medications from MTT-SHC to refill stock.
•  Medication monthly Physical count and report to Head Nurse at Central SHC at MTT.
•  Medication is keeping safety in the cabinet and always locked.
•  Help to prepare Medication and Dispensary for Dr. Quach Mobile clinic.
•  After Dr. Quach Mobile clinic help to do physical count medication and keep it back then give statistic to Head Nurse to do report to finance and MJQF and Group of operation unit.

Medical Equipments:

• Know how to operate all medical equipment being used in Student Health Center.
• Recognize all new medical equipment and how to use it.
• Proper use medical equipment and responsibility for all of them.
• Clean and organize Medical equipment after used it and peek back the same place.
• Teaching:
• Instruction to patient how to take medication with the right way at home.
• Teach to Patient about nutrition which is related to their diseases.
• Instruction to patient to avoid alcohol during taking medication.
• Explain patient to see doctor by follow up or come back as soon if not better.
• Medical Team demonstration First Aid to teacher and student.
• Teaching to Patient for new disease, prevention and announcement.
• Teaching to student or Staff about hygiene.

Communications: Team Work:

• Work as team and communicate with receptionist front desk, Doctor, Head nurse, Laboratory to help to improve our primary care for staff, student and patients.
• Work as team to promote to sell our package to student families and staff family
•  Good relationship with customers, student and all staff in all departments. 
•  Provide First Aid for student and Staff for field trips.
Job Requirement:
• At least bachelor degree in Nursing or relevant major 
• Fresh graduate are encourage to apply
• 3 years of professional working experience in this field
• Good customer services for all patients and good communication departments
• Computer sciences Microsoft word, Excel, Power point, database, internet searching, e-mail and class lectures
• Result Driven and Proactive 
• Branch ChroyChangva.

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.

position: ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
Job Description:
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាជួសជុល ថែទំា និងតម្លើងថ្មី។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការគ្រប់គ្រងឧបករណ៍ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់ កុំឱ្យបាត់បង់។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្នែកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារលាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់តាមពេលវេលាកំណត់។
• ភារៈកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក។

** ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើន ជូនដល់បុគ្គលិករបស់ខ្លួន ដែលក្នុងនោះរួមមាន៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  ប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៏ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ
Job Requirement:
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ចេះសរសេរ និងអានបានល្អ
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់
• ភាពវិជ្ជមាន និងការបើកចិត្តឱ្យទូលាយ
• អាកប្បកិរិយាថ្លៃថ្នូរ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
• មានរបៀប និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់
• មានទំនុកចត្តិខ្ពស់លើខ្លួនឯង
• មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ
• សកម្ម និងរហ័សរហួន
• អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
• មានការសហការណ៍ល្អ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
- រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ (Hard and Soft)
- តាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ
- រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុកៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យ
- បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ
- អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ
- ធ្វើបារកូដ (Barcode) សៀវភៅ
- បញ្ចូលកាតឡុកសៀវភៅ
- គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ
- ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ
- បោសសម្អាតអនាម័យ បន្ទប់បណ្ណាល័យ ធ្នើសៀវភៅ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ
- ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ
- បកលេខកូដចាស់ចេញពីសៀវភៅ
- ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន(សប្តាហ៍ទី១នៃខែបន្ទាប់)
- ផ្តល់ជូនកម្មវិធីនិទានរឿង បត់រូបភាព កែច្នៃសម្ភារ ដល់សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី១-៦ ដែលចូលតាមកាលវិភាគ
- ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- សម្អាតអនាម័យតាមធ្នើសៀវភៅទាំអស់ (រៀបសៀវភៅតាមធ្នើឡើងវិញ)។
- រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យ
- ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម
- ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ
- ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សា បឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ កំឡុងខែវិច្ឆិកា-មករា នាដើមឆ្នាំសិក្សា
- ចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ។
Job Requirement:
- ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
- ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស  និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ
- ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស
- ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
- To establish necessary policies procedures in order, manage risk within government’s applicable laws and regulations.
- To communicate risk policies processes in order to ensure that the potential risk management is integrated into daily operations.
- To monitor, coordinate and assist business departments/units register risks, including mitigation plan control.
- To produce report tailored the relevant stakeholders about most significant risks to ensure business heads understand risks that might affect departments as well as individuals understand their own accountability and individual risks.
- To communicate explain external risk posed by corporate governance stakeholders.
- To create business continuity plans.
- To conduct policy compliance audits, this will include liaising with internal external auditors.
- To review new major contracts internal business proposals.
- To Review the strategy and approach for new and emerging operational risks.
- To oversee enterprise risk management and program, ensuring that policies, controls, testing and reporting are in place. To ensures that corrective measures are undertaken in a timely fashion.
- To ensure new products, projects or business changes are approved and are introduced within a prescribed process, including the appropriate management of risks.
- To perform a risk assessment and a risk evaluation and establish the level of risk that MJQE is willing to take.
- To develop risk awareness, deliver training, and support for all employees involved, ensuring that all have a good understanding of risk management and compliance issues.
- To assess the organization and recommend, prioritize and implement relevant organizational and service-specific quality policies.
- To make recommendations and implement quality assurance, ensuring that the systems and process are in place and working to meet any standards set for achievement.
- To prioritize and escalate issues resulting in non-compliance.
- To ensure all works are carried out in accordance with any quality assurance system or service quality standards.
- To hands-on development risk models, assure controls operating effectively, provide and analytical support.
- Other tasks assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO.
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor Degree in Business Management, Human Resources Management, Laws, Finance and relevant fields (MA preferred)
- A minimum 5 working experiences in risk and compliance
- Demonstrate strong knowledge risks identification, assessment, management frameworks
- Strong knowledge control frameworks  the ability design evaluate effectiveness controls embedded within business processes
- Knowledge of laws and regulations and education standards.
- Excellent communication skills, including English and writing skills
- Ability work independent, team, under pressure highly self-motivated
- Knowledge of statistics and data collection, organizational, interpersonal skills
- Strong sense urgency high level commitment determination delivers great result
- Strong communication and reconciliation
- Computer literate MS Word, MS Excel, PowerPoint, Internet E-mail

job title: Doctor - Specialty Training in Family Medicine
position: Doctor - Specialty Training in Family Medicine
Job Description: Doctor - Specialty Training in Family Medicine
Job Requirement:
** Looking for Doctors to join our Paid 3 Year Family Practice Specialty Training Program: During our 3 year family practice specialty training program at our Christian medical center, doctors in training have an opportunity to learn through one-on-one teaching during each patient visit and for patients staying in our inpatient department. Areas of medicine covered include Family Medicine, Internal Medicine, Pediatrics, Women’s Health, Palliative Care, Surgery, Ophthalmology, Podiatry, Counseling, Physical Therapy and others. Doctors in training can also study in our regular skills lab and family practice training course and have an opportunity to apply for an online master in family medicine from Loma Linda University in the U.S.A. Candidates must have already passed the national state exam or be scheduled to take it this year.
Employment benefits include:

- Competitive Salary and Staff Savings Plan
- Healthcare for immediate family members
- Educational development opportunities
- Onsite subsidized dorm accommodation for single staff

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
•	Works with Users, Business Project Managers, IT Support Team, IT PMO, Finance, Commercial and other stakeholders to understand their needs and requirements and tailor appropriate solutions.
•	Formulating, suggesting, and managing data-driven projects which are geared at furthering the business's interests
•	Delegating tasks to Data Scientists in order to realize the successful completion of projects.
•	Cross-validating models to ensure their generalizability
•	Producing and disseminating non-technical reports that detail the successes and limitations of each project
•	Interpreting data, analyzing results using statistical techniques and Machine learning
•	Analyze and communicate business needs by translating business requirements into technical specifications
•	Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality
•	Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems
•	Conduct full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, activities and design
•	Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
•	Maintain and define new process improvement opportunities
•	Build analytic report and data visualization Dashboard
•	Maintain and monitor for data accuracy
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk if require
Job Requirement:
-	Education: Advanced degree in Data Science, Statistics, Information Technology 
-	Experience: at least 3 year experiences in Data Science, programming (Python/R), statistical and Machine Learning 
-	Skills: programming (Python/R ….), BI tools, statistical analysis, Machine learning and data analysis
-	Knowledge: data analysis, analytic report/dashboard, database (Oracle, Postgres), big data tools, business concept
-	Attitude: active, hard-working, honest, responsibility, friendly

job title: Assistant Manager of School and Public Safety
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Assistant Manager of School and Public Safety
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

Job Description: យើងខ្ញុំកំពុងស្វែងរក ជំនាញកាត់តវីដេអូ ដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍ដើម្បីចូលរួមក្រុមរបស់យើង និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ ។អំពីតួនាទី​នេះ​​តម្រូវ៖- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំអាជីពកាត់តវីដេអូ-​​​ យល់ពីសិល្បះទាក់ទាញអ្នកទស្សនាតាមរយះវីដេអូ- ជាមនុស្សមានការច្នៃប្រឌិត​ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមបាន​- មនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមនិងលើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯងដោយផ្តោតសំខាន់លើលទ្ធផល - មានជំនាញជាមួយកម្មវិធីសំរាប់កាត់តវីដេអូលក្ខណះអាជីពណាមួយច្បាស់លាស់​ និងមានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀនសូត្របន្ថែម- អាចប្រើភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ-អាចធ្វើដំណើរតាមខេត្ត​ ពេលវេលា​និងម៉ោងធ្វើការ៖- ការងារពេញម៉ោង​ និងអាចមានថែមម៉ោង- ៥ថ្ងៃកន្លះ ក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៍- ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកសាធារណៈ- ពេលវេលាធ្វើការអាចបត់បែនសូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបនិង Portolio របស់អ្នកមកយើងខ្ញុំ ។
Job Requirement: យើងខ្ញុំកំពុងស្វែងរក ជំនាញកាត់តវីដេអូ ដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍ដើម្បីចូលរួមក្រុមរបស់យើង និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ ។អំពីតួនាទី​នេះ​​តម្រូវ៖- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំអាជីពកាត់តវីដេអូ-​​​ យល់ពីសិល្បះទាក់ទាញអ្នកទស្សនាតាមរយះវីដេអូ- ជាមនុស្សមានការច្នៃប្រឌិត​ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមបាន​- មនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមនិងលើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯងដោយផ្តោតសំខាន់លើលទ្ធផល - មានជំនាញជាមួយកម្មវិធីសំរាប់កាត់តវីដេអូលក្ខណះអាជីពណាមួយច្បាស់លាស់​ និងមានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀនសូត្របន្ថែម- អាចប្រើភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ-អាចធ្វើដំណើរតាមខេត្ត​ ពេលវេលា​និងម៉ោងធ្វើការ៖- ការងារពេញម៉ោង​ និងអាចមានថែមម៉ោង- ៥ថ្ងៃកន្លះ ក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៍- ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកសាធារណៈ- ពេលវេលាធ្វើការអាចបត់បែនសូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបនិង Portolio របស់អ្នកមកយើងខ្ញុំ ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Miss. Sek Kanchna Administration Manager 085971111 recruitment@ehrcambodia.com Phnom Penh #195E1, St.63, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang I, Khan Chamcamon, Phnom Penh 085971111

Job Description:
•	Managing IT Service desk
•	Generating weekly, monthly and overall progress IT services dashboard to management
•	Design, develop, implement and coordinate systems, policies and procedures
•	Ensuring security of data, anti-virus, network access and backup systems
•	Monitoring IT assets at it accuracy
•	Managing information systems: VMware ESXI, vCenter, Window server, File server, Firewall.
•	Managing cloud email, G Suite (Google) and ZOHO cloud server
•	Handle annual budget and ensure cause effectiveness 
•	Overseeing the whole network and IT Service and strike to improve and add more value to the organization
•	Documenting over technical guideline, knowledge base and diagram.
Job Requirement:
Skills: 

• Good understanding of ITIL & project management.
• Preferred Knowledgeable of server management/Services support software and hardware.
• Familiarity with various operating systems and other platforms
• Extensive experience with VMware, window server and cloud computing

Qualifications: 

• Bachelor or Master degree of relevant
• Two years’ work experience in Service support and IT technical
• Proficiency in English
Company Profile:
We import quality equipment & product all over the world to ensure you are only using the best. We also provide reliable after sales services to support you as you start your coffee business journey.

 Founded in 2009, KOFI is one of the largest company which distributes Espresso coffee, Espresso coffee machine, Syrup and other related coffee accessories in Cambodia. Our main priority is to focus on quality services, professionalism and integrity.

 We have expanded ourselves with 4 showrooms in difference provinces to better serve our customer all over Cambodia. With full coverage services in Phnom Penh, SiemReap, Sihanouk Vile and Battambang.

job title: ប្រធានប្រតិបត្តិការ ផ្នែកសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ជូន អន្តរទ្វីប
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ប្រធានប្រតិបត្តិការ ផ្នែកសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ជូន អន្តរទ្វីប
Job Description:
គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី: 
ទទួលខុសត្រូវទៅលើផ្នែកទាំងមូល ជាតំណាងផ្នែកចូលរួមដោះស្រាយ ទំនាក់ទំនង ជាមួយខាងផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ ឬផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ដើម្បីដាក់ផែនការមកបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ និងតាមដានការងារ ហើយពង្រឹង និងពង្រីក ដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យផ្នែកមានស្ថេរភាព មានការរីកចម្រើន។ គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យចំណូល ចំណាយប្រចាំផ្នែកទាំងមូល គ្រប់គ្រងជើងដឹកសិស្ស និងចំនួនសិស្សតាមតំបន់នីមួយៗ គ្រប់គ្រងសេវាកម្មរថយន្តសាលា គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធបង់លុយ ពង្រីកតំបន់ឡានរត់ ដើម្បីបង្កើនអតិថិជន គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកឱ្យមានស្ថេរភាពក្នុងការងារ បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងណែនាំបុគ្គលិកឱ្យមានសមត្ថភាព    ខ្ពស់។ គ្រប់គ្រងការងារជួសជុលរថយន្តប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងមានរបាយការណ៍ច្បាស់លាស់អំពីដំណើរការជួសជុល។

ទំហំការងារ:
• រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការការងារ និងគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកទាំងមូលឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព
• ឆ្លងឆ្លើយជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ជាពិសេសជាមួយក្រុមគណៈគ្រប់គ្រងជាន់ខ្ពស់ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការ និងទទួលផែនការបន្តទៅកូនក្រុម
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាទាំងក្នុងផ្នែក ក្រៅផ្នែក និងជាមួយអតិថិជន
• មើលការខុសត្រូវផ្នែកសេវាកម្មរថយន្តសាលា និងផ្នែកយានដ្ឋាន អាឡិច គួច

ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ

• គ្រប់គ្រងសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ជូន អន្តរទ្វីបទាំងមូលមាន សេវាកម្មរថយន្តសាលា និងយានដ្ឋានអាឡិច គួច
• គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធតាមដានភូមិសាស្រ្ត GPS
• គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធ DATA BUS ឡាន
• គ្រប់គ្រងលើទិន្នន័យឡានទាំងអស់
• គ្រប់គ្រងតំបន់ឡានរត់ និងសិក្សាពង្រីកតំបន់ថ្មី និងបិទតំបន់មួយចំនួន
• ទទួលទិញឡានថ្មី ចូល និងសិក្សាលក់ឡានចាស់ៗចេញវិញ
• គ្រប់គ្រងទិន្ន័យការចាក់ប្រេងប្រើកាតជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន TOTAL ទាំងបីសាខា
• គ្រប់គ្រងរបាយការណ៍សិស្ស ប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ម រថយន្តសាលាប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និង ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ និង ចុះហត្ថលេខាចំណាយ និងចំណូល ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និង ប្រចាំខែ ក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងមូល
• ចុះហត្ថលេខា តំណាងស្ថាប័ន លើលិខិត សុំច្បាប់ និងកិច្ចសន្យាការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
• ពិនិត្យ CV បេក្ខជនដាក់ពាក្យ និងចូលរួមសម្ភាសន៍ជាមួយផ្នែកHR
• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពតំណាងផ្នែក និងតំណាងស្ថាប័ន ដូចជាការ ប្រជុំ វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ។ល។
• ចងក្រងបទបញ្ញត្តិ និងតាមដានការអនុវត្តន៍ច្បាប់ដែលបានដាក់ចេញឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់
• សិក្សាអំពីទីផ្សារខាងក្រៅ ដើម្បីកែប្រែនូវផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តក្នុងផ្នែក
• បើកអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដើម្បីចែកចាយព័ត៌មាន និង ពង្រឹងច្បាប់ទម្លាប់
• ចូលរួមដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេង
• បើកវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងបំពាក់បំប៉នសមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក
• រឈមមុខក្នុងការដោះស្រាយ វិវាទបុគ្គលិក និងជាតំណាងស្ថាប័ន
• ណែនាំបុគ្គលិកដែលមានកំហុសចុងក្រោយ

** ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើន ជូនដល់បុគ្គលិករបស់ខ្លួន ដែលក្នុងនោះរួមមាន៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  ប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៏ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ
Job Requirement:
ការសិក្សា:
• បរិញ្ញាបត្រ (ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងអាជីវកម្ម ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព) 

ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 25 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារគ្រប់គ្រង់ និងដឹកនាំអាជីវកម្មសេវាដឹកជញ្ជូន យ៉ាងហោចណាស់3 ឆ្នាំ
• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការរៀបចំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុក្រុមហ៊ុន (ចំណូល ចំណាយ និងចំណេញ) 
• មានចំណះដឹងខាងច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ និងការបើកបរ
• មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet & Email)និងភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាចប្រើប្រាស់បាន
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ  និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ 
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
* Responsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the following:

- Setup data backup & restoration test planning to make sure for disaster recovery capability of IT
system and ERP server farm.
- Setup preventive maintenance plan for IT system and ERP server farm.
- Preventive maintenance and administer on core IT system and ERP server farm, plus monitor
ERP server health and performance.
- Perform monthly basis for ERP database re-index and provide recommendation on ERP server
farm enhancement if needed.
- Implement, coordinate and support on new infrastructure enhancement project.
- Primary contact on infrastructure system for vendor and facilitate system
enhancement/requirement with local/oversea vendor.
- Provide system support to core users/vendor on IT Infrastructure.
- Troubleshoot functionality on IT system with proper guideline and documentation record.
- Coordinate between business owner and vendor on infrastructure enhancement project.
- Facilitate on resource planning, scope of work defining and budgeting for infrastructure
development milestone.
- Provide training on new deployment of using IT infrastructure system.
- Facilitate in end user policy revision on using IT infrastructure.
- Manage documentation on any changing of IT infrastructure in proper manner for each specific
revised version.
- Prepare IT infrastructure diagram and maintain it with each specific updated version.
Job Requirement:
•Degree in Architecture, Architectural Engineer
•At least 4 years relevant experience in financial technical management & construction coordination, preferably gained from F&B industry.
•Diploma or above holder in architecture and engineering is an asset.
•Ability to communicate clearly and concisely (English and Khmer), both orally and in writing.
•Ability to negotiate with vendors
•Ability to work in a fast pace environment.
•Ability to manage multiple tasks
•Experience in document control & budgetary management or related disciplines
•Excellent interpersonal, communication and negotiation skills
•Highly proficient in MS application, especially in Excel, Word, Power Point
•Be hands-on and open-minded thinking.
•Knowledge in design software; AutoCAD Architecture, 3D Studio MAX, Sketch up Pro., at Very good level or higher.
•Proven track record of bringing construction projects in on time and within budget is preferred.

Company Profile:
Opportunity to be more than an employee

Starbucks to enter Cambodia, its 16th market in the China/Asia Pacific region and has opened its first location in Phnom Penh International Airport and currently we are brewing at another 25 locations in Cambodia. 

Starbucks values our employees as “Partners” and we as a team contribute to the great success and continual growth of our business.  Our mission is to inspire and nurture the human spirit – one cup, and one neighborhood at a time.

In Starbucks, we embrace diversity to create a place where each of our partners can be ourselves.  We always treat each other with respect and dignity. Job Description:
- Recruit and oversee retail outlets
- Provide training to retail outlet and ensure that quality of merchant is meets company standards
- Manage retail outlets to ensure required documents are collected within the agreed timeline.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
1. Coordinate and execute Chip Mong’s annual PR and CI activities.
2. Collaborate and provide support to marketing and communication activities of various business units of Chip Mong as assigned by the supervisor.
3. Manage and work with agency and other service providers to ensure deliverables of the project.
4. Produce public relations contents in different formats to promote the company’s PR and CI activities on both traditional and new media platforms.
5. Contribute to develop social media contents and manage the social media platform of Chip Mong including Facebook Page, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube, and Email as required.
6. Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
Bachelor’s degree in Media and Communication, Marketing, News Media or other related fields
    Minimum 2 years of work experience as public relation specialist, communication specialist, or other related fields 
    Knowledge of public relations and community investment
    Basic knowledge of multimedia production
    Knowledge of social media strategy
    Knowledge of multimedia content production
    Ability to plan
    Project management skill
    MS Office skills
    Interpersonal communication skills
    Communication skills (written and verbal) in Khmer and English
    Writing skill in Khmer and English
    Commitment to provide support out of the scope of work
    Flexible to travel
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Monita LY  068855833 sopheara.chhum@chipmong.com #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 068855833

Company Profile: CamboPura Glass, CPG, is a joint venture between Heng Sreng Hong Co., Ltd and Le-Guardian Pte., Ltd. The name is a combination of the word Cambodia and Singapura, exemplify the establishment of the glass factory in the Kingdom of Cambodia with the high standards and stringent quality of Singapore. Job Description:
** Branch Manager (សាខាថ្នល់ទទឹង ខេត្តកណ្តាល)

** ទីតាំងជ្រើសរើស៖ ខេត្តកណ្តាល  (សាខាថ្នល់ទទឺង ០១នាក់)

** ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- រៀបចំផែនការប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំត្រីមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំសម្រាប់សាខា បញ្ចេញឥណទានទៅតាមផែនការ និងបង្កើតយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រដើម្បីសម្រេចផែនការឥណទាន
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងតាមដានការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី និងការសងត្រលប់របស់អតិថិជន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង រួមមានត្រួតពិនិត្យម៉ត់ចត់លើ ឯកសារឥណទាន អតិថិជន និងបុគ្គលិក ស្រមតាម គោលការណ៍ និងនីតិវិធីរបស់ម៉ាក់ស៊ីម៉ា
- ពិនិត្យការងារគណនេយ្យ និងកិច្ចការរដ្ឋបាលនៅក្នុងសាខា
- បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងបង្ហាត់បុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ លើកទឹកចិត្ត ថែរក្សាបុគ្គលិក និងចូលរួមក្នុងការប្រកាសជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក
- ចាត់ចែង និងចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃបុគ្គលិកក្រោមឪវាទ
- ចាត់ចែង និងដោះស្រាយវិវាទ ឬបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ របស់បុគ្គលិក អតិថិជន ឬអ្នកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
