Job Description:
- Ensure accuracy bookkeeping of all company transactions
- Provide timely and accurate monthly and year-end financial reports to management.
- Maintain and develop a reliable, well-functioning transparent and efficient accounting system.
- Manage product costing
- Advise the leadership in all financial aspects by providing reliable financial data at any time and project such data to the budget planning.
- Oversee all financial relevant aspects of all company operations.
- Maintain cash before bank deposit, daily cash recon and monthly bank reconciliation.
- Check and Maintain Inventories moment.
- Check all unsold stocks requests and submit additional information and advice to the Sale & Marketing for prepare Clearance Promotion.
- Check on AR aging to ensure that outstanding fee are collected properly
- Implement and develop most effective and efficient accounting procedures
- Provide constantly professional advice and support to the accountants.
- Interact professionally with cash collector officers of the banks.
- Ensure that appropriate resources and staff are available for the department.
- Ensure well function of the accounting software and provide repetitive training to all users.
- Supervise all month-end and year-end accounting procedures including preparation and entry of journal entries for Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Payroll and General Ledger computer systems.
- Ensure the payments are accurate and prepare on a timely basis as required and follow procedure/policy.
- Check payroll on a timely basis and accuracy.
- Work with both, internal and external auditors during financial and operational audits if any.
- Check and implement on company taxes
- Ensure to update all related accounting information to Accounting Team on time and accurate(Any related accounting information received from any stakeholders).
- Additional responsibilities and reports as assigned by Finance Manager Ensure well function of the accounting software and provide repetitive training to all users.
Job Requirement:
- Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor or Finance Manager
- Advanced computer skills on MS Office, accounting software and databases
- Ability to manipulate large amounts of data
- Proven knowledge of bookkeeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws and regulations
- High attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to direct and supervise

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Company Profile:
SITC International Holdings Limited is a leading shipping and logistics enterprise in Asia headquartered in Hong Kong. Its business areas include container liner transportation, ship management, ship brokerage, international freight forwarding, LCL, project logistics, logistics distribution, customs declaration, warehousing, Container yard, wharf, shipping agency, bulk cargo and other fields.

As of December 31, 2021, the company operated a total of 96 container ships and 5 bulk carriers. Among them, there are 68 self-owned container ships; 74 routes are operated, and the network covers mainland China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Thailand, the Philippines, Cambodia, Indonesia, Singapore, Brunei, Malaysia, Bangladesh, Myanmar and Russia. 74 major ports in 16 countries and regions. According to Alphaliner's statistics, as of December 31, 2021, SITC ranked 16th among global container shipping companies in terms of shipping capacity; in 2021, the maritime container shipping volume exceeded 3.142 million TEUs (excluding empty containers).

Currently, SITC has built and operated depots in Qingdao, Shanghai, Ningbo, Tianjin, Dalian, Xiamen, Vietnam, Haiphong, Ho Chi Minh, Thailand, Bangkok, Laem Chabang, Thailand, Jakarta, Surabaya, Semarang, South Africa, and Johannesburg and Cape Town, South Africa. , Warehousing business logistics park. At the same time, it maintains long-term joint venture and cooperative relations with world logistics and famous production enterprises such as Damco Logistics, Singamas, Tsingtao Brewery, Hisense, etc.

Company Profile:
Carter’s is the leading brand of children’s clothing, gifts and accessories in America, selling more than 10 products for every child born in the U.S. Our designs are based on a heritage of quality and innovation that has earned us the trust of generations of families.

We continue this heritage in every little detail to make dressing easier for mom and life more comfortable for babies, and as we move into the future, we are proud to help families like yours with innovative products and new ways to shop for them.

Throughout the years, Carter’s has been known for its thoughtful little details like the Handi-Cuff mitten sleeve that protects babies from self-scratching, and the Jiffon neck design that slips over little ears for easy outfit changes – and although we’ve grown a lot since the early days, we stay true to the philosophy that earned us the trust of generations of families.

Company Profile: Healthy Homes (Cambodia) Co., Ltd គឺជាក្រុមហ៊ុនចែកចាយផ្តាច់មុខនូវ ប្រព័ន្ធសម្អាត Rainbow ដែលមានអាយុកាលតាំងពីឆ្នាំ១៩៣៦ ពីសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក ជាមួយការធានា ៤ឆ្នាំ ជុំវិញពិភពលោក, ដោយការិយាល័យកណ្ដាលមកពីសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក ហើយបង្កើតសាខានៅ ប្រទេសកម្ពុជាតាំងពីឆ្នាំ ២០១៤ ដែលមានគោលណ៏ដៅក្នុងការជួយអោយការរស់នៅរបស់ប្រជាជនខ្មែរយើងកាន់តែប្រសើរឡើងជាមួយសុខមាលភាពដ៏ល្អ។ ចំណូលគឺជាកត្តាសំខាន់សម្រាប់មនុស្សគ្រប់រូប (ការរស់នៅ គឺងាយស្រួលប្រសិនបើយើងចេះរកលុយ)  ជាមួយអាយុកាលជាង ៨៥ឆ្នាំ ពីសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក និងចែកចាយជាង ៩០ប្រទេសជុំវិញពិភពលោក។ ប្រព័ន្ធសម្អាត Rainbow ត្រូវបានបញ្ជាក់ថា ពិតជាបានរួមចំណែកធ្វើអោយបុគ្គលិករាប់ពាន់អ្នក ដែលមានចំណូលតិចមកមានចំណូលខ្ពស់ ផ្លាស់ប្តូរពីការជិះម៉ូតូទៅឡាន ពីការស្នាក់នៅបន្ទប់ជួលទៅធ្វើជាម្ចាស់ផ្ទះខ្លួនឯងផងដែរ។ អ្នកបន្ទាប់ អាចជារូបអ្នក !! យើងកំពុងរង់ចាំ បុគ្គលិកដែលមានការខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងក្នុងការងារមានក្តីសុបិន្តខ្ពស់ ដែលអាចអភិវឌ្ឍន៌ខ្លួនពីអ្នកលក់ម្នាក់ទៅជាអ្នកលក់ដ៌ជោគជ័យមួយរូបនៅថ្ងៃអនាគត។ Healthy Homes (Cambodia) Co.,Ltd គឺក្រុមហ៊ុនមួយរបស់ជនជាតិសង្ហបុរី និងចែកចាយប្រព័ន្ធសម្អាតអាមេរិកតាំងពីឆ្នាំ១៩៣៦។ យើងកំពុងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ (Sales Executive) ដែល មានឱកាសក្លាយទៅជា ប្រធាន់ផ្នែកលក់(Sales Supervisor), អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ (Sales Manager) នឹង អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ជាន់ខ្ពស់ (Senior Sales Manager) តាមការខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងធ្វើការអស់ពីសមត្ថភាពរបស់ខ្លួន។ សូមចូលមើលព័តមានបន្ថែមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន​ តាមរយះវេបសាយខាងក្រោម៖ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាលនៅអាមេរិក: https://youtu.be/vnRQcvDJpTg Website USA: https://rainbowsystem.com/Website Cambodia: http://rainbowsystem.com.kh/កំណត់ចំណាំៈ ក្រុមហ៊ុនរបស់យើង គឺមិនមែនជាទីផ្សារបណ្ដាញ (NOT multi-level marketing) ហើយក៏មិនមែនជាក្រុមហ៊ុនលក់អចលនៈទ្រព្យទេ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Ethan HR Manager 099777947 ethan@healthyhomescambodia.com Level 1, ST Building, #19, Street 183, Phnom Penh (near Vanda Institute Mao Tse Toung) 099777947

Job Description:
- Achieving branch’s target
- Find potential individual clients for all kind of loan products
- Submit Credit Memorandum to Supervisor for approval
- Handle customer’s complaint and take appropriate action to solve them
- Arrange the loan agreement, pledge legal documents at cadastral office
- Conducting marketing activity and loan management
- Assist to recover bad debt of branch
- Deliver customer services, strengthen network relationships
- Other tasks assigned by Supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 3 years of Credit Officer experience in commercial bank
- Good at written and spoken English and Chinese is preferable
- Minimum finished Bachelor Degree in Banking and Finance or related field
- Computer Knowledge of Microsoft & Word & Excel
- Having high integrity and team work oriented
- Good communication and interpersonal skills
- Ensure all loan profiles comply with internal policies
- Can Speak Chinese is priority
Company Profile:
Sunny Bank was established on October 2, 1957 which provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. Now Sunny Bank has 105 branches in Taiwan, total assets are USD 21.7 billion, and ranks 654th in “The Banker 2021” top 1000 world bank list by tier 1 capital. For providing overall financial services to customers, Sunny Bank also owns various financial field subsidiary such as Sunny Securities Co., Ltd., Sunny Assets Management Co., Ltd., Sunny E-Commerce Co., Ltd., Sunny International Leasing Co., Ltd. in Taiwan, as well as Sunny International Leasing Co., Ltd. (China) in Shanghai, China. Sunny Microfinance Plc. is 100% subsidiary owned by Sunny Bank.

We will continue to provide small and micro credits loan to Cambodian people via our operating branches in Cambodia. Our management team has good experiences and consolidate staff training schemes for developing the professional personal and corporate financial services in Taiwan. Meanwhile, Sunny Microfinance Plc. will be devoted to becoming a solid financial institution which grows with the path of economic growth in Cambodia.

Job Description:
** DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
1- Administration
- Planning for staffs training for whom under supervision
Foreign teacher induction
- Arrange class schedule and calendar
- Work and reporting to school management teams and board of directors
- Enforcing the school policies and Standard of Procedure
- Report directly to the superintendent and answer questions by the school management teams and board of directors
- Support, motivate, and evaluate staffs under supervision
- Formal and informal inspect on staffs under supervision
- Substitutions teachers, if needs

2- Academic
- Curriculum management, development, evaluation, and ensuring it aligns with government education policies and international standards
- Ensure provision of a coherent, flexible, broad, and balanced curriculum in line with education in Cambodia and international curriculum
- Manage technical and academic practices in all aspects
- Develop, customize learning materials, and conduct education frameworks for foreign languages
- Set the direction for long-term development, strategies, and goals which relates to educations Scoring systems
- Verify and approve report cards, weekly plans, and assignments
- Students entry testing, placement, and consulting
- Evaluate and improve assessment materials and methods
- Be available for Parent-Teacher Conferences (PTC) at the end of each semester, which generally happens on a weekend
- Other tasks assigned by BLIS management teams

3- Communication
- Dealing with complaints about academics and staffs under supervision
- Appointment with parents and staffs under supervision
School representative
- Work closely with school management, the board of directors and make referrals or conference with parents if necessary
- Conduct a survey or evaluations with parents to determine satisfaction and improvement of programs

4- Cooperation
- Establish and maintain a cooperative relationship with other staffs under supervision
- Mediator between staffs under the supervision and the school management
- Interpret school core values to staffs under supervision

5- Quality assurance
- Articulated vision, mission, and policy to the stakeholders
- Staffs under supervision development need
- Procedures in place for program evaluation

6- Quality improvement
- A continuing and dynamic process to review, critique and change to make education better

7- Ethics
- Show parental heart, concern, and discipline in teaching
children
- Shall act in good faith and make a decision based on the overall interests of students
- Shall observe the confidentiality principle and not disclose any sensitive information of school to anybody; cannot disclose discussions of individual managers' meetings and views without authorization.
- Shall not use a school academic coordinator's position to seek any gain for personal interests or other people's interests.
- Shall not accept payments, gifts, or favor that might affect the objectivity in conducting the management committee's business.
Job Requirement:
** Education: 
- A university degree or equivalent qualification in
English or other related fields

** Work Experience
• 3 years or more experience in academic affairs
• Extensive knowledge of Cambridge, IEYC, and IPC
• Good knowledge of relevant computer application with good English
• Good communication and interpersonal skills, teamwork and professionalism

** Language Proficiency
• Fluency in written and spoken English

** BENEFITS
 Competitive salary
 Seniority Pay
 NSSF
 Maternity and paternity leave
 Sick leave and annual leave
 Paid national holidays
 Marriage leave
 Professional development through conference, seminar, workshop, etc.
 Work permitted and Visa Extension benefits
 Progressive salary increase based on experience and performance

Job Description:
** KEY DUTY AND RESPONSIBILITY .
Under the overall supervision of the Head Teacher & Program Coordinator, the incumbent shall carry out the following duties and responsibilities:
- Assist the class supporterand classroom management/ maintain a clean, safe and a fully organized classroom.
- To assist the lead teacher in the preparation and maintenance play learning center
- Organize and attend parent-teacher meeting regularly
- Supervise students in the class, schoolyard or tutor students’ arrival
- Monitor and motivate students’ education
- Help the class teacher set up suitable activities for the student’s learning abilities
- Promotes students’ interest in lessons
- Facilitates the delivery of lessons
- language capability, can all understand the teacher
- Facilitate group exercises and supplementary activities
- Ensures students’ participation
- Promotes students’ discipline
- Prepares supplementary activities
- Conveys ideas clearly using the English language
- Addresses individual needs among students
- Follows class schedule strictly by BLIS
- Maintains clean and orderly classroom
- Uses school’s facility with care
- Assists Parent-Teacher Conference and help to inform parents about the performance of each student Khmer/English.
- Follows school BLIS policies/plans
Job Requirement:
** Education: Undergraduate or Bachelor Degree of English or related fields

** Work Experience:
- Female only
- At least one year teaching experience with children
- Like working with kids, be patient and creative with fun
- Experience in taking care of children
- A genuine care, concern and interest for children
- Experience in working with international school curricula (preferred)
- Speaking English proficiency
- Strong sense of self-initiative, enthusiastic and positive work attitude.
- Good planning and organizing skills  Sensitivity, good character, politeness and patience are key assets

** BENEFITS
 Competitive salary
 Seniority Pay
 NSSF
 Maternity and paternity leave
 Sick leave and annual leave
 Paid national holidays
 Marriage leave
 Professional development through conference, seminar, workshop, etc.
 Work permitted and Visa Extension benefits
 Progressive salary increase based on experience and performance

Job Description:
** DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES .
Under the overall supervision of the Head Teacher & Program Coordinator, the incumbent shall carry out the following duties and responsibilities:
- Be responsible for teaching kindergarten or primary students ranging from 2 to 12 years old
- Be responsible for implementing Cambridge, IEYC and IPC curriculum effectively
- Evaluate and maintains complete and accurate records regarding students' academic progress and physical, social and emotional growth, and communicates with parents on the individual students
- Plan and evaluate daily lessons that are appropriate to students’ aptitude and interest
- Provide clear instruction, organization and effective management in the classroom
- Supervise students in the classroom in a respectful and positive manner
- Be responsible for creating a safe and tranquil learning environment.
- Be responsible for class compensations.
- Adhere to all BLIS systems, protocols and policies initiate, plan and participate in parent conferences and other BLIS events
Job Requirement:
** Education: A university degree or equivalent qualification in English and/or other related fields

** Work Experience:
- Be a native speaker
- At least 2 years or more experience in working IEYC and/or IPC curriculum
- Familiar with the operational practices and expectations of the school.
- Work collaboratively and constructively with colleagues.
- Deep understanding of Early Childhood students, and primary and their needs
- Proven ability to work in a multi-cultural environment
- Recent and relevant professional development
- Experience in and understanding of IEYC and IPC

** BENEFITS
 Competitive salary
 Seniority Pay
 NSSF
 Maternity and paternity leave
 Sick leave and annual leave
 Paid national holidays
 Marriage leave
 Professional development through conference, seminar, workshop, etc.
 Work permitted and Visa Extension benefits
 Progressive salary increase based on experience and performance

Job Description:
1. ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងាររដ្ឋបាល និងវិធីគ្រប់បែបយ៉ាងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក រយះពេល២ឆ្នាំឡើង
2.ស្គាល់បណ្តាញជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្សេងៗនិងទំនាក់ទំនងការងារ
3.ស្វែងយល់និងស្ទាត់ជំនាញពីការអភិវឌ្ឍនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល
4.ស្មោះត្រង់និងសុភាពរាបសា មានអាកប្បកិរិយាល្អ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ
 ត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ចេះសរសេរ និយាយភាសាចិន ខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេសបានយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ
ការងារលំអិត៖
1.ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការជ្រើសរើសមុខតំណែងសំខាន់ៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងយោងទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់នាយកដ្ឋានផ្សេងៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
2.ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអ្នកមានទេពកោសល្យរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
3.ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការរៀបចំផែនការបុគ្គលិកក្រុមហ៊ុននិងបង្កើនប្រសិទ្ធភាពធនធានមនុស្ស
4.ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលថ្នាក់លើប្រគល់ជូន
Job Requirement:
1. ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងាររដ្ឋបាល និងវិធីគ្រប់បែបយ៉ាងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក រយះពេល២ឆ្នាំឡើង
2.ស្គាល់បណ្តាញជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្សេងៗនិងទំនាក់ទំនងការងារ
3.ស្វែងយល់និងស្ទាត់ជំនាញពីការអភិវឌ្ឍនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល
4.ស្មោះត្រង់និងសុភាពរាបសា មានអាកប្បកិរិយាល្អ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ

Company Profile:
The A.P. Moller – Maersk Group was founded in 1904 in Denmark. Since then, the Group has grown into the largest shipping & logistics provider in the world. It has more than 300 offices and representations in over 100 countries worldwide employing more than 76,000 people. The activities, apart from shipping and logistics, include industry, retail, shipbuilding as well as oil & gas exploration.

Maersk Cambodia, its affiliated company, has been supporting the Cambodian trade since 1992, being one of the first international container shipping companies to serve the Cambodian market. It remains one of the largest container shipping lines operating in Cambodia today.

position: Manager, CMS & Switching Administration and Technical Support

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Video Editor is responsible for editing, and producing photos and videos for internal and external purposes.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- A video editor uses digital software to organize video and sound files into a final product. 
- Gather and transfer all forms of media into editing software and ensure each was updated in the correct format
- Operate computer editing systems and equipment used for video media and effects
- Establish a clear understanding of the storyline and purpose of the video's creation
- Improve video and sound quality using various video - Trimming footage and putting together the rough project.
- Inserting dialog, sound effects, music, graphics, and special effects
- Edit video to include preselected music, interviews, sound clips and other important aspects of the project
- Edit short film, short series, promotion video, and all marketing videos 
- Ability to work to a tight schedule.
- Other task assigns by line manager and management
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & requirement:

- Bachelor's degree in film editing or related degree is required
- Professional mastery of video and audio editing software and programs
- Ability to multitask and work toward several milestones on various projects simultaneously
- Creative experience in filmmaking and videography
- Experience editing various video projects and inserting sound effects, music and transitions, animation
- Excellent communication skills are required to have a solid understanding of project scope and implementation
- Familiarity with 3D composition and special effects
- Hands-on experience with editing software, including Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro X, Avid Media Composer, Lightworks, and Premier, DaVinci 
- Be able to travel as assigned.

4. Working Days and Hours:

- Monday to Half-Saturday Morning: 8:00am to 12:00PM & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

5. Working place:

- Video Editor is based at Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth, the department of Marketing.

6. Relationship:
- Video Editor Works under supervision & reports directly to Senior Marketing Manager.

7. Salary and Benefit:

- Salary (Negotiable)
- Up to 300% annual incentive
- Annual Salary increment
- Annual Staff Party
- Annual Trip
- Education Sponsorship
- Internal and External Training
- Special price for house loan
- Seniority Pay

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:

• Uncapped commission

JOB DESCRIPTION 
• Gain a clear understanding of the workflows of various medical specialties
• Prospect and identify new opportunities including cold calling, attend marketing events, etc.
• Constant follow up for leads and sales opportunities 
• Strategize, develop, and expand the company medical and healthcare business
• Accelerate and deliver business objectives in terms of revenue, margin, and market-share

• Manage and grow key accounts, while maintaining good rapport with customers
• Provide quality service to the clients and attend to their needs as and when required
• Build rapport and maintain good after sales service to existing customers to maintain retention and get referrals
• Identify new accounts by conducting thorough market surveys
• Constantly engage with customers (doctors, nurses, engineers, buyers etc.) through calls and visits
• Conduct presentations and training sessions with potential clients and users
• Engage with business partners from abroad (US, Switzerland, Germany, Japan, Australia, China, etc.)
• Maintain professional and clinical knowledge by attending local or overseas product training sessions and medical exhibitions
• Keep abreast of current industry trends, market developments, and competitor information
Job Requirement:
• Independent, self-motivated and result driven individual with high level of integrity
• Fluent in Written and spoken English
• Possesses excellent communication interpersonal, and presentation skills, outgoing, result oriented, and willing to take on challenges
• Substantial experience in sales preferred
• Capable of building trusting relationships
• Ability to perform in fast-paced environments

• Working Hours: 9-6pm (6 days work week) 

QUALIFICATION
• Diploma in relevant field of studies (Medical, Biology, Engineering, or Business related)
• Professional Certificate, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree

Job Description:
The Senior Backend Developer (SBD) design and develop API and Backend for mobile and web application. SBD will actively involve in developing testable and maintainable complex backend system. SBD will be required to do code review and guide other junior developers to follow development best practices. 

RESPONSIBILITIES 

•	Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using software development best practices
•	Design and develop API for best app performance and strong security
•	Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
•	Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
•	Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, scaling and optimizing our project
•	Create and maintain software documentation
•	Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations
and activities
•	Provide training and support to teams on development best practices
•	Collaborate with frontend developers for smooth integration
•	Design system architecture and database schema for app that scale
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENTS 
•	2+ years of relevant experience backend development using PHP (preferably Laravel
Framework) or NodeJS.
•	A deep familiarity with TDD development process
•	Able to cope with fast paced working environment
•	Passionate to grow and ability to learn new technology
•	Sound understanding of REST
•	Solid knowledge in data structures, algorithms, and OO Design
•	Solid knowledge of system security, data protection, user authentication and authorization between multiple systems
•	Solid knowledge of Relational Database
•	Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
•	Experience with other databases such as In-Memory, Columnar Based would be a plus
Company Profile: Sabay Digital is the leading digital media and entertainment group in Cambodia. Our diverse brands share a common mission: help our customers get the most out of the online revolution. With cutting-edge services, engaging content and leading online properties, we want Sabay (meaning “Happiness”) to always be associated with awesomeness. We strive to innovate in everything we do: online and mobile gaming, movies, infrastructure, content platforms and more. We are proud to have in our portfolio Sabay News, the most visited Khmer website. Cambodia is an exciting country with a dynamic youth community eager to play an active role in the digital era. Sabay Digital Corporation (formerly known as CIDC Information Technology) was formed in 2007 to help meet this demand, with new services and products including online content and mobile entertainment. Sabay is a forward thinking pioneer and has been the first to introduce online gaming, unified SMS content and original online entertainment (news, movies, music and TV) in the Kingdom of Wonder. Our vision is to be a source of inspiration for the youth of Cambodia in their pursuit of happiness and our mission is to make every interaction with Sabay an awesome experience.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   086 737 554/099 470 726 hr@sabay.com #308, Phreah Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 086 737 554/099 470 726

Job Description:
The Project Manager at Sabay manages a large software project implementation with different backend and frontend development teams. Project Manager defines project milestone (sprint) for the different development team which implementing micro services and micro frontends and helps them understand project goal, scope and product domain. 

Key Responsibilities: 

Project Management (Backends and Frontends): 
•	Implement Agile (e.g. Sprint, Sprint Backlog, Sprint review) in the team to manage multi-micro services software project
•	Ensure that goals, scope, and product domain are understood by everyone in the Scrum Team
•	Help prioritize tasks and align expectations and deliverables
•	Regulate Daily Scrum meeting to ensure that project milestones will be met in a timely manner
•	Help the team to stay focus on tasks and remove impediments that slow down the team’s progress
•	Define and follow up each team’s goal to achieve the main project goal
•	Ensure that each team work together smoothly on project collaboration
•	Follow up on existing projects
Team Management and Coaching: 
•	Help each team to reach consensus for what can be achieved
•	Maintain a safe working environment for the team by helping with conflict resolution
•	Coach product owners, development team members and other Project Manager of smaller teams toward scrum practice
•	Help oversee the scrum and development teams
Job Requirement:
Key Requirements: 

•	Minimum 2 years of experience working as a Project Manager or Product Owner driving software (App) development project
•	Proven experience in ability to motivate and inspire teams
•	Proven experience in delivering software-based projects and products
•	Knowledgeable in Agile methodology and scrum and able to coach others including product owners and development teams in scrum adoption.
•	Great communication skills including facilitation, negotiation and conflict resolution
•	Familiarity with TDD, automated testing, unit testing, integration testing, CI/CD,
•	Pair programming practices
•	Ability to manage a large software project and facilitate and coordinate the development team to achieve the desired outcomes
•	Understanding of software development processes and procedures
•	Keen interest in complex problem solving, building large project
•	Knowledge with web technologies like – HTML5, CSS, Javascript and relevant frameworks (Node.js, Angular.js, React.js)

Job Description:
The QA Developer designs, documents and implements software testing procedure to effectively test all in-house developed software projects to ensure the software is working as intended and specified in the project goals. The QA Developer will review the automated testing codes written by developers to ensure sufficient code coverage and delivers the right tests to ensure functionality as specified in the project goals.
The QA Developer will design test scenario, setup continuous testing, run test and ensure positive test results before deployment.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Quality Assurance:
•	Lead test strategy of assigned projects to ensure the quality of products
•	Conduct software automated testing processes for unit, system, end to end integration test, data flow and customer experience test and product release sign-off
•	Review requirement and design test plan and scripts
•	Define necessary test automation, design automation flow, share implementation effort with software engineer
•	Drive the velocity of product development together with scrum team
•	Recommend for improvements to the testing processes
•	Maintain version control and update schedule for major software used in projects
•	Coach developers on automated unit and system testing
•	Ensure quality practice of assigned scrum team using agile methodology
2. Continuous Integration/Continuous Development:
•	Implement Continuous Testing pipeline into Gitlab CI/CD
•	Ensure testing will be automated as much as possible
•	Maintain base/core container images to ensure that security benchmarks are met and the latest stable, minimal OS and approved dependencies are used
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

•	Minimum of 3 years of experience in software quality assurance, with 1 year leading team
•	Knowledge in at least two of the preferred programming language – PHP, Ruby, Go, Javascript
•	Experience and knowledge with web and mobile application development
•	Experience with designing test plans and scripts
•	Experience with automated testing, unit testing, integration testing
•	Experience integrating testing into continuous testing pipeline would be a plus
•	Deep knowledge of testing tools such as Selenium, Mocha, Jest, PHP Unit
•	Ability to facilitate and coordinate the team and collaborate with developers

Job Description:
The Backend Developer develop new technologies as well as enhance existing technology to support our enterprise-grade backends. The Backend Developer will have exposure to a range of technologies including NodeJS, Blockchain, MongoDB, Clickhouse. This role actively involved in developing efficient, testable and maintainable microservice as well as integrate various technologies in search of a perfect commercial solution to the business needs. 

Key Responsibilities:

•	Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using software development best practices.
•	Design and develop backends that serve enterprise-grade customer facing mobile and web apps.
•	Design and implement low-latency, high-availability and performant Microservices with strong security.
•	Integration data from various backend services and databases such as MongoDB, MySQL or Clickhouse database.
•	Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends.
•	Create and maintain software documentation.
•	Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle of the core product and sub-product sets.
•	Take ownership and ensure high quality and timely delivery of developments in accordance with plans.
Job Requirement:
Key Requirements:

•	2-5 years of relevant experience in backend or fullstack development, preferably NodeJS
•	Passionate to grow and keen interest in learning new technologies (such as ReactJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Blockchain, RabbitMQ, Docker, etc)
•	Familiarity with automated testing or TDD development process
•	Sound understanding of REST API and implementing security measure
•	Solid knowledge in data structures, algorithm and OO Design
•	Solid knowledge in system security, data protection, user authentication and authorization between multiple systems
•	Solid knowledge of relational database and/or NoSQL database
•	Experience with blockchain technology would be a plus
•	Experience with designing and developing microservice would be a plus

Job Description:
Purpose
The Frontend Developer will work on developing efficient, testable and maintainable micro frontends such as PWA, web applications using modern web framework such as ReactJS, React Native, VueJS and conforming to test driven development practice by writing automated testing. The Frontend Developer also maintain and improve on the existing projects to improve the customer facing product for better user experience.

Key Responsibilities: 

•	Develop and maintain responsive web applications, PWA using trending frontend technology such as React, VueJS, AngularJS.
•	Troubleshoot and debug applications
•	Build reusable and testable code and libraries for future use
•	Conform to test driven development practice by writing unit test, system test
•	Collaborate closely with backend developers for API integration
•	Contribute to overall user experience of the products
•	Gather and address technical and design requirement
•	Create and maintain software documentation
•	Perform other tasks as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
•	2-5 years of relevant experience in frontend web or mobile app development
•	A deep familiarity with TDD development process with tools such as Mocha, JsUnit, Jest
•	Working knowledge of the general web landscapes, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
•	Sound understanding of JavaScript (ES6), React.js, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, SASS
•	Strong hand on React or VueJS and responsive design
•	Able to cope with fast paced working environment
•	Passionate to grow and ability to learn new technology
•	Solid understanding of full mobile development cycle

Job Description:
- Reporting directly to General Manager/Site Manager and supervision day to day operation of site work.
- Follow up contractor and/or sub-contractor to ensure that work is being carried out as per design/ specification/or planning.
- Checking technical designs and drawing to ensure that they are followed correctly. 
- Supervising sub-contracted workers.
- Making the calculation about pressures, loads and stresses.
- Analyze configuration of basic components of structure.
- Consider the strength of construction materials and select appropriately.   
- Providing technical advice and solving problem on site
- Conducting regular job site inspections, plan and oversee the construction of new buildings.
- Understanding about Décor work.
- Understanding of water proof and water proof products is advantage.
- Identify and highlight possible risk on project accurately inventorying construction material.
- Ensuring that health and safety on site work.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Civil Engineering and other equivalent degree.
- At least 1year experience as site engineer.
- Be able to use application 2D & 3D, AutoCAD.
- Can work under pressure.
- Water proof skills is advantage.
- Team Work Player.
- Responsibility with work.
- Be able to manage workers at site

** Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 7:00am to 11:00am & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 11:00am to 1:00pm
** Working place:
- Site Engineer: is based at Site in Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh.
** Relationship:
- Site Engineer: works under supervision & report directly to Site Manager/General Manager.
** Salary and Benefit:
- Salary (Negotiable)
- Meal Allowance.
- Phone Allowance.
- 13th Month Salary.
- Annual Salary increment.
- Annual Staff Party.
- Annual Trip.
- Other rewards.
- Internal and External Training

Job Description:
** Duties and Responsibility
•	Develops and implements human resources policies and procedures (quality service standards) and all HR related management and administration of the workforce.
•	Job Posting (via Recruitment Advertisement, Recruitment Agencies, etc.)
•	Conducts interviews (jointly with sub-section heads and or departmental heads)
•	Conduct reference checks
•	Administers offer of employment process (from preparation of contracts through to associate reporting for duty)
•	Provide upward communications via 360 degrees feedback
•	Supports human resource management role and administration functions from induction of new hire through termination/cessation inclusive of counseling, guidance and policies compliance on employee relations industrial relations (disciplinary issues) including that of conduction of domestic inquiry,
•	Administers the HR System and Time Management System (TMS – bio scan) in partnership with Finance Payroll Unit (Finance Account Team). Maintenance of Human Resource database and supervises payroll matters through processing, documentation (PAFs) and process flow in partnership with payroll unit (Finance Account Team).
•	Administers the registration of new hires with Employee Provident Fund (EPF) and Social Security (SOCSO) authorities in conformance with legal requirements.
•	Assists the Group Human Resources Manager in the bi-annual and annual Performance Management System in conjunction with T & D section
•	Assist the Group Human Resources Manager in the area of compensation and benefits by conducting bi-annual inter-company salary, service point and benefits benchmarking. Maintenance of salary, service point and benefits entitlement structure.
•	All other duties as required.
•	Ensure proper monitoring and administration of the following task by HR personnel: -
-	Preparation of employment contracts.
-	Opening of personal files for new associates and maintenance of personal files.
-	Bio scan - Fingerprint registration.
-	Induction packs and walks about induction for new staff including arrangement for uniform fitting.
-	Preparation of letter to open bank account.
-	Preparation of Associate ID cards and Medical Check up.  
-	Keying in of new recruit data.
-	Tracking of confirmation i.e. reminders to HODs, 
-	Preparation of confirmation letters
-	Preparation of extension of probationary letters
-	Preparation of all movement letters i.e. transfers, promotions, re-designations, salary adjustments, cross exposure, retirement notice, etc.
-	Preparation of anniversary increment letters.
-	Preparation of resignation computation & resignation acceptance letter 
-	Notifying Payroll to release salary once associate has completed clearance.
-	Preparation of Absence from Work & (Breach of Contract) Self Termination letters. 
-	Verification of annual leave & other types of leave from the departments against the HR system.
-	Approval of Medical Leave in the HR system.
-	Registration for NSSF.
-	Withdrawal of Work permit contribution for foreign workers.
-	Attending to associates’ & walk-in applicants’ queries.
-	Issuance of Medical Claim to associates.
-	Preparation of fruit baskets to be sent to associates admitted into hospital.
-	Prepare associates weekly activity (Birthday and Team building).
Job Requirement:
•	4 years' experience in HR Admin role.
•	Experience in supervisor role maybe advantageous.
•	Understanding and knowledge skill of HR Admin and local labor law.
•	Strong analytical, organizational, and creative thinking skills.
•	Excellent communication, interpersonal skills.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

job title: Senior Client Success Executive (Digital Advertising Sales) (Urgent)
position: Senior Client Success Executive (Digital Advertising Sales) (Urgent)
Job Description:
Purpose
The Customer Success Executive’s primary responsibility is to generate sales revenue for the company by promoting and selling media products and services. The CRE will work closely with the Creative, Media, Production, Social Media, and Finance departments for all projects. 

Key Responsibilities: 

•	Study and understand all facets of the media products and services being offered
•	Approach potential clients through new leads, cold calls, existing relationships, promotional events, or other means
•	Attend meeting with clients to understand their needs and get the business brief
•	Determine clients’ current and future advertising and marketing needs, creating customized solutions and closing sales for retained and incremental revenue
•	Research to understand the brand communication of certain brands
•	Develop sophisticate sales proposals
•	Deliver a skilled sales pitch to potential clients, either by phone or in person, in an effort to secure a sale
•	Explain the benefits and potential audience of specific media offerings to potential clients
•	Offering a price and negotiating around it
•	Maintain excellent relationships with all clients and look for other business opportunity
•	Facilitate successful sales by collecting client information and providing order information to related departments
•	Track every deal made to ensure that it is completed accurately and on time
•	Attend tradeshows, or participate in industry events or trainings
Job Requirement:
•	Passionate and empathetic toward the customer experience
•	Self-motivated, pro-active, results-oriented professional with an ability to work with minimal direction
•	Diligent/detail oriented & organized
•	Possesses the ability to create, maintain and enhance customer relationship
•	Knowledge of the local and international digital media market with the ability to respond effectively to market direction, client needs and competition
•	Deep relationships with local advertising agencies and clients
•	Ability to establish rapport, develop credibility and sell ideas to senior management
•	Must have the ability to maintain a professional approach with others in job-demanding multitasking and/or project support situations
•	Strong communicator that is clear, concise and tailored to various audiences both verbal and written
•	Excellent written and verbal communication in Khmer and English. Chinese an advantage
Company Profile: Sabay Digital is the leading digital media and entertainment group in Cambodia. Our diverse brands share a common mission: help our customers get the most out of the online revolution. With cutting-edge services, engaging content and leading online properties, we want Sabay (meaning “Happiness”) to always be associated with awesomeness. We strive to innovate in everything we do: online and mobile gaming, movies, infrastructure, content platforms and more. We are proud to have in our portfolio Sabay News, the most visited Khmer website. Cambodia is an exciting country with a dynamic youth community eager to play an active role in the digital era. Sabay Digital Corporation (formerly known as CIDC Information Technology) was formed in 2007 to help meet this demand, with new services and products including online content and mobile entertainment. Sabay is a forward thinking pioneer and has been the first to introduce online gaming, unified SMS content and original online entertainment (news, movies, music and TV) in the Kingdom of Wonder. Our vision is to be a source of inspiration for the youth of Cambodia in their pursuit of happiness and our mission is to make every interaction with Sabay an awesome experience.

Job Description:
Purpose

The Accountant is responsible for the cashier and receivables and payables function of the Finance Department, and performs other tasks as assigned by line manager. 

Key Responsibilities: 

•	Issue sales invoice and ensure the accuracy of invoices/statement of account to customers
•	Manage sales of digital points to customers
•	Perform revenue collection, bank deposit, and reconciliation of cash and bank accounts and other relevant accounts
•	Manage and maintain custody of cashier float as assigned by the FC/Management
•	Prepare payments to local/oversea vendors
•	Prepare relevant accounting vouchers and ensure the vouchers are complete with proper supporting documents, and entering of double entries into accounting system
•	Assist in preparation of tax declarations and filing of monthly taxes as assigned by the FC/Management
•	Prepare weekly and monthly sales report, cash report, and other reports as requested by line manager
•	Support team in the closing of monthly and yearly report within the allocated time frame
•	Comply with accounting policies and procedures in all tasks and processes
•	Perform other tasks assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
Key Requirements:

•	Bachelor degree in Business Administration or related field
•	A minimum of 2 years’ experience in similar role
•	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and accounting software (preferably SunSystems)
•	Strong communication skills.
•	Self-directed, proactive and problem solving skills with high attention to detail
•	Ability to work as a team and in a multi‐cultural environment
•	High responsibility, commitment and working ability to meet the deadline and result-oriented
•	Good interpersonal skills and attitude
Company Profile: Sabay Digital is the leading digital media and entertainment group in Cambodia. Our diverse brands share a common mission: help our customers get the most out of the online revolution. With cutting-edge services, engaging content and leading online properties, we want Sabay (meaning “Happiness”) to always be associated with awesomeness. We strive to innovate in everything we do: online and mobile gaming, movies, infrastructure, content platforms and more. We are proud to have in our portfolio Sabay News, the most visited Khmer website. Cambodia is an exciting country with a dynamic youth community eager to play an active role in the digital era. Sabay Digital Corporation (formerly known as CIDC Information Technology) was formed in 2007 to help meet this demand, with new services and products including online content and mobile entertainment. Sabay is a forward thinking pioneer and has been the first to introduce online gaming, unified SMS content and original online entertainment (news, movies, music and TV) in the Kingdom of Wonder. Our vision is to be a source of inspiration for the youth of Cambodia in their pursuit of happiness and our mission is to make every interaction with Sabay an awesome experience.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   086 737 554/099 470 726 hr@sabay.com #308, Phreah Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 086 737 554/099 470 726

Job Requirement: មិនទាមទារបទពិសោធន៍ និង​ ការសិក្សាDelivery growth - in Asia and beyond . Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: Planning (business plans and estimates):• Annual Business Planning and quarterly estimates process management and control in GA functions• Development of budget templates, models and reports to ensure completeness and sufficient details• Collaboration with and support GA functions to ensure timely, relevant and reasonable zero-based budgets • Budget consolidations and submission to local and global ERP/BI systems.Month closing, Reporting and analysis:• Participation in month closing process through preparation and review proposed accruals• Preparation of business performance reports, analysis and commentaries for deviations vs target/plan/estimates, addressing the issues and proposing solutions, improvements and insights• Risks and Opportunities analysis• OpEx and CapEx analysis• Lead OCM (Operational Costs Management) cycle process in companyTools/System projects:• Automation projects - participating in projects related to improve ERP system and reporting.Function Supporting:• Participation in cross-functional projects.• Develop Partnership.H&S / EHS:• Lead by example and actively support EHS activities within your area and be accountable for EHS awareness and performance under your area of responsible. • Ensure to be complied to the Group and local EHS policies and standard. • Ensure adequate risk assessments are carried out which, involving employees and contractors, during the development of the safe work procedures for the activities to be performed under your scope• Ensure all personnel under your control are adequately trained about the risk associated with their jobs. • Ensure the third-party temporary labor worker working under your area are adequately trained and to be complied for the site EHS rules.• Ensure adequate PPE is available for employee and contractors working under your area• Ensure that periodic inspections are conducted to identify EHS concerns and action plans has been developed and implemented to eliminate EHS issues from its source. • Ensure employee and contractors under their supervision have at least one personnel performance priorities are related to EHS activity or topic.
Job Requirement: • University graduate or above in relevant discipline• 3+ years relevant experience in sizable business, controlling experience preferred• FMCG experience is preferred• CPA, ACCA or other accounting qualification holders preferred.• Experience from multinational companies and working in matrix structures.• Broad business and commercial understanding.• Ability to focus on long-term objectives balanced with the right short-term actions in order to execute and achieve business goals.• Ability to think strategically but also focus on tactical and operational issues• High level of numerical and analytical skills• Strong business acumen and ability to deliver Finance strategy linked to the Business strategy.• Working knowledge of short- and long-term budgeting and forecasting, rolling budgets and product-line profitability analysis.• Knowledge of finance, accounting, budgeting, and cost control principles including Generally Accepted Accounting Principles.• Ability to analyze financial data and prepare financial reports, statements and projections.• Technical knowledge of relevant legislative and regulatory requirements and standards and International Finance Reporting Standards (IFRS).• Organized, responsive, able to work under pressure and to focus on delivering results • Analytical skills to utilize BI and ERP tools for data mining. • Familiar with ERP system (NAV, SAP or Oracle preferable) • Good working knowledge of Excel (Power Pivot, Power Query), Power BI & PowerPoint• Good command of EnglishStakeholder management:• Ability to work to meet the deadlines• Work with Large data• Provide commercial and financial insights• Ability to communicating in written and oral in a very clear way for non-financial staff

Job Description:
Talent Development Program 
	Work closely with managers in identifying, nominating, assessing & developing talents, 
	Conduct regular briefing to managers on talent toolkits such as how to identify talents, talent program initiatives, and rewards program for talents,
	Design, organize, implement and evaluate the talent program. 
	Support talents, leaders & manager transition between roles that are promoted within the organization.  
	Support talent initiatives through talent development programs such as facilitating assessment centers (MDC, TDC, Maximizer Assessment Center), Career Aspiration interviews, Career Conversation between Talents & Managers, Psychometric Testing (Korn Ferry Assessment), individual development plan, succession planning, sending talents for trainings and oversee assignment coordination. 
	Coordinate activities between Regional (Prudential Corporation Asia) talent programs & Prudential Cambodia to make sure both are aligned. 
	Drive talent programs to ensure enough internal talent pools and successors are ready for next level and supporting business grow.
	Maintain the proper records of talent data & produce talent reports and dashboards for management on the regular basis. 
	Oversee talent program budgets 

Management Trainee Program 
	Research on best practices of Management Trainee program within industries or regions, 
	Design, develop, implement and evaluation the effectiveness and success of Management Trainee program and its journey to meet business strategies & objectives. 
	Communicate with other departments and functions on projects and business needs that require support from Management Trainees. 
	Coordinate the calibration of performance review of Management Trainee with Department Head/Department Chief. 
	Ensure the responsibilities and tasks of MT help them to stretch their capabilities into management or supervisory roles upon completion of the program by assigning them training & learning courses, mentoring and coaching programs with Chief and through departmental rotations.
Job Requirement:
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, presentation and facilitation skills
	Driven, highly motivated, 
	Good English speaking, writing and listening skills
	Business acumen 
	University degree in Human resources, education, business/management or related field 
	Minimum four (4) years in training and development, organizational development, related Human Resources experience.
	Able to work with data and analyzing tools, esp. perform Data analysis & create dashboards, provide recommendations,
	Knowledge of HR best practices, esp. in Talent Development, psychometrics, Training effectiveness evaluations, 
	Knowledge of learning programs: hard skills and soft skills training and how to tailor or personalize them for talent needs,
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information PCLA Recruitment HR Manager 087333908 pclarecruitment@prudential.com.kh Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 087333908

Job Description:
- Prepare conceptual diagrams, tender application and presentations 
- Prepare and present architectural feasibility reports and design proposals 
- Implement quality of architectural design production according to building codes, law, requirements and architectural graphic standards 
- Implement the operation system from concept, schematic design through the development of construction documents as per guidance from the Senior Architect, Assistant Architect Supervisor and Supervisor 
- Create building design and highly detailed DWGs both by hand and by using CAD applications 
- Produce 3Ds utilizing Sketch Up-modeling and rendering, 3Ds Max-modeling and rendering as appropriate for both project modeling and renderings 
- Responsible for completing own designing work in timely and efficient manner 
- Exhibit basic understanding of general design concept of architecture, structure and MEP 
- Join regular site visits to check on construction progress to monitor compliance with plan and quality-check 
- Follow company's design procedures
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Architect design or a related field 
- At least 1-2 years of experience in Architect design, or a related area
- Good knowledge of: 
   + Drafting and construction practice and theory 
   + Design development, building design, documentation and detailing on a wide variety of projects 
- Be able to organize the project  
- An in depth understanding and working knowledge of architecture
Self-motivated with the ability to prioritize workload 
- Have strong visual awareness and an eye for detail 
- Able to work as part of an effective team assisting and supporting team members 
- Have good drawing skills and be able to use computer application (2D, 3D, 3DMax, Sketch UP, Photoshop etc.,) 
- Have a logical, analytical and creative approach to solve problem 
- Have good presentation skills 
- Good English language

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. Job Description:
The Social Media Manager is responsible for Sabay brand’s voice across the various social media platforms to maintain and raise the public perception of Sabay as a company. The Social Media Manager will help distributing our different contents and driving quality engagements with the community to ensure effective delivery of Sabay’s social media objectives. 

Key Responsibilities:

•	Ensure content is posted timely across social media platforms
•	Respond to and address the community’s queries and complaints professionally
•	Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor customer reviews
•	Drive engagement and conversations with the community to promote brand loyalty
•	Identify tactical and relevant opportunities to engage with the community
•	Work closely with relevant teams to drive positive sentiment and optimize on content opportunities and brand consistency
•	Design and implement social media strategy to align with business goals
•	Ensure that Sabay image is appropriate and consistent across various social media platforms
•	Generate, edit, publish and share engaging contents daily; for examples, original text, photos, videos and news
•	Maintain brand integrity across activities, platforms, product lines, and all other internal and external communication
•	Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions
•	Conduct researches on current benchmark trends and audience preferences
•	Monitor and analyze industry best practice globally and locally, including content, social media and activation trends and activities of competitors
•	Prepare monthly social media platform and campaign reports
•	Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applications
•	Perform other tasks as assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
Key Requirements:

•	Appropriate qualifications in marketing, PR, business, or related discipline; or equivalent business experience
•	3+ years of experience working as a social media manager or in digital media, digital marketing, content development, or similar role. Bonus: experience in marketing or branding for online/digital products, media or technology
•	Proven capacity in developing successful brand strategy and campaigns. Bonus: experience in branding for innovation, technology or youth brands
•	Excellent creativity and imagination to generate concepts that are exciting and awe inspiring
•	Proven ability in Microsoft Office and online tools such as WordPress, Search Engine Optimisation, Google Analytics and social media platforms (particularly Facebook, Youtube, Twitter and Instagram)
•	Analytical and multitasking skills
•	Team player who can build effective relationships across teams
•	Excellent interpersonal skills with experience in multi-cultural and linguistically diverse settings
•	High level of clear written and oral communication skills
•	Proficient in Khmer and English. Other languages (Thai, Chinese, etc) an advantage
Company Profile: Sabay Digital is the leading digital media and entertainment group in Cambodia. Our diverse brands share a common mission: help our customers get the most out of the online revolution. With cutting-edge services, engaging content and leading online properties, we want Sabay (meaning “Happiness”) to always be associated with awesomeness. We strive to innovate in everything we do: online and mobile gaming, movies, infrastructure, content platforms and more. We are proud to have in our portfolio Sabay News, the most visited Khmer website. Cambodia is an exciting country with a dynamic youth community eager to play an active role in the digital era. Sabay Digital Corporation (formerly known as CIDC Information Technology) was formed in 2007 to help meet this demand, with new services and products including online content and mobile entertainment. Sabay is a forward thinking pioneer and has been the first to introduce online gaming, unified SMS content and original online entertainment (news, movies, music and TV) in the Kingdom of Wonder. Our vision is to be a source of inspiration for the youth of Cambodia in their pursuit of happiness and our mission is to make every interaction with Sabay an awesome experience.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   086 737 554/099 470 726 hr@sabay.com #308, Phreah Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 086 737 554/099 470 726

Job Description:
- Oversee inventory both physical and system  according to company guidelines
- Perform critical inventory tasks to ensure the correct amount of items are in stock
- Maintain updated and accurate records of inventory, including transfers, cycle counts, and full counts
- Review documentation and monitor product codes to search for discrepancies; troubleshoot quantity discrepancies between stock and records
- Develop and implement improvements to existing operational procedures in order to maximize efficiency and cut operations costs
- Collect and analyze data to determine appropriate order quantities; process orders for shipment
- Review operations schedules and demand to ensure timely stock fulfillment
- Track rates of accuracy, purchase and return as well as defective items to inform quality control decisions
- Prepare, generate, and file financial inventory reports; review reports monthly with management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree majoring in accounting, banking and finance, is a plus if Master Degree or Doctorate Degree in Finance, and/or  related fields.
- Working experiences in food industry or similar position is a plus.
- Good knowledge of food safety standard ex GMP, HACCP, Food Safety and BRC.
- Great organization, time management, and planning skills
- Good interpersonal, honesty, communication, creative, independent and detail-oriented skills.
- Able to communicate in English, both in speaking and writing.
Company Profile:
Indoguna Cambodia Co., Ltd is a food service solutions provider. We are in six countries and 14 cities now;
Singapore, Dubai, Hong Kong, Thailand, Vietnam and Cambodia. For over 20 years, we’ve been at the forefront of the food and beverage industry, dedicated to sourcing the finest the world has to offer and serving it to you.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
- Help in welcoming the students.
- Greet the parents and the students during arrival and picking-up time.
- Prepare student’s snacks & breakfast.
- Assist the homeroom teacher in giving instructions during activity period and accomplishing the worksheet of the day.
- Assist the homeroom teacher in arranging the classroom after class time.
- Help motivate the students.
- Give extra help to children with special needs or students whom English isn’t their first language.
- Help with school events, trips and other excursions.
- Attend meetings & teacher conferences.
- Do any other tasks given by the homeroom teacher and the higher supervisors.
Job Requirement:
- Must be in the 1st or 2nd Year of studies in the English field
- Be knowledgeable in managing children in different classroom situations
- Must possess a calm and patient attitude.
- Be hardworking
- Have good English speaking skills
- Must have a commitment in the working place
- Experienced with children is an advantage.

** Interested candidates must submit your CV with a cover letter and necessary documents to SIS International School (Veng Sreng Branch), #29-35, Veng Sreng Blvd, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh. SIS International School (SIS) is one of the largest and leading private language institution in Cambodia which provides General English Program to child and adult learners and Khmer General Education Programs from kindergarten to grade 12 at its centre in Phnom Penh. SIS is fully recognized by the Ministry of Education, Youth, and Sport.

job title: Deputy Regional Head/ Assistant Sales Manager
position: Deputy Regional Head/ Assistant Sales Manager
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

•	Assist a Region Plan and execute sales strategies and sales target for company by influencing sales/BE staff.
•	Assist Region to Publish and report weekly and monthly sales facts, providing sales figures for staff to understand.
•	Assist Region to manage the sales activities of accounts located throughout his sales and his direct reports sales territory. 
•	Drive solution selling capabilities throughout the institution 
•	Assist Region to facilitate activities between clients, bank, operations and executives, as well as other activities as needed to complete strategic selling process and new business development. 
•	Work with business team to provide market updates. 
•	Assist Region to implement established sales plans and customer strategies. 
•	Ensure sales support functions are in place 
•	Assist Region to train new sales staff/BE and bank staff as necessary. 
•	Monitor customer preferences to determine focus of sales efforts.
•	Travel with sellers to evaluate and provide guidance. 
•	Maintain product knowledge of our products and services. 
•	Maintain industry knowledge of the uses and needs for our products and services. 
•	Refresh training to BE and Bank staff as monthly plan
•	Ability to sell insurance outside banking hour 

Others

•	Work closely with Banca, Operational team and other relevant team.
•	Carry out other duties appropriate to this post as requested by line manager
Job Requirement:
Position Requirement 
•	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Financial, Management or the equivalent experience. 
•	Experience in sales: 3+ years of consultative sales experience 
•	3+ years sales team management experience 
•	3+ years data sales experience 
•	Recognized credible thought leader 
•	Demonstrated ability to manage complex deals
•	Understand basic insurance concepts
•	Be struggle and honest
•	Understand about MFI and bank institutions
•	Ability to travel around provinces
Company Profile: Sovannaphum Life Assurance is a joint venture company between Canadia Investment Holding PLC and Muang Thai Life Assurance PLC. Since starting its operation in 2016, Sovannaphum Life has served to more than 60,000 customers. Sovannaphum Life has been awarded The Fastest Growing Life Insurance Company in Cambodia for 3 consecutive years, 2018, 2019 & 2020. We are here for you, we are you for Cambodia. ​For more info, visit www.sovannphumlife.com or official ​Facebook & Instagram page.

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities

-Provide a comprehensive secretarial and administration service to the Chief Executive Officer across the range of his/her work
-Organize meeting, take a minute, and prepare meeting material
-Maintain and organize the CEO’s schedule, filing system, travel arrangement and all other relevant tasks as necessary
-Handle incoming mail, confirm appointments 
-Perform other related tasks assigned by direct supervisor, CEO and/or BoD members
-Keep the CEO’s Office record and information strictly confidential
-Provide essential support to project team
-Do report accuracy and meet the timeline set
-Organize project meetings with related department
-Do market analysis on insurance industry
-Maintain crucial project documents which track project progress
-Manage the project schedule, monitor the deadlines for each project task
-Identify any potential issues or risks that could impact the progression of the project by communicating these items with supervisor, project team to work to identify potential solutions.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 
-Bachelor degrees in Management, Business Administration, Statistics, or related field
-At least 2 or 3 year experiences in a professional work setting, preferably in administration
-Proven track record of producing professional presentations and reports
-Professional proficiency in Ms. Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook)
-Familiarity with basic research methods and reporting writing techniques
-Strong Communication skills in Khmer and English
-Strong attention to details
-Ability to think creatively and innovatively
-Ability to work under pressure
-Strong communication skill and a reasonable command of the English language
-Result-oriented, committed, flexible, and self-driven individual.

Job Description:
- Perform data entry of all new applications submitted by sales force
- Check and verify medical checkup requirement within the guideline/policy
- Perform all transactions in the system such as: withdrawn, postpone, decline…… based on customer’s request or underwriting decision
- One policy is approved, prepare insurance contract and work with appointed courier to deliver policy to the customer
- Perform insurance documents filing and scanning without any loss with proper record keeping and tracking
- Prepare refund list and supporting document to Finance when customers request to cancel application/policy 
- Handle other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree of business administration or related fields
- 1- 2 year experiences in life insurance business or financial industry
- Able to work with multi-task environment
- Good command of English language 
- Computer proficient
- Detail-oriented, energetic, and hard working

Job Description:
To build cordial working relation with bank staff at all levels.
• To work with staff of bank partners to identify potential banking customers with financial protection needs.
• To provide professional insurance advice to customers of our bank partners.
• To provide after sales service to the successful cases.
• Coordinate work between the bank and the company if any.
• Advice and coach sales techniques to bank’s employees at the assigned branches.
• To be involved in activities of the bank partners, including joining the bank meeting, visiting to bank customers…etc.
• To perform other tasks assigned.
Job Requirement:
1-2 years sales related experience.
• Fresh graduated and/or the fourth year students with outgoing personality are also encouraged to apply.
• Understand the basic of Computer literacy
• Be able to communicate in English will be added advantage.
• Be able to communicate, present and interact with others.
• Highly self-motivation and strong commitment to work in sales role.
• Be able to work flexible hours.
