Job Description:
1.	ជំហានដំបូងមុនទៅទិញបន្លែត្រូវពិនិត្យមើលការបញ្ជាទិញ(បុង)ជាមុនសិន ហើយត្រូវមើលឲ្យយល់មុននឹងទៅទិញ បើឆ្ងល់ត្រង់ណាអាចសួរបាន ជៀសវាងកុំឲ្យទិញខុស
2.	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹង និង ជំនាញតថ្លៃទំនិញគ្រប់មុខនៅតាមទីផ្សារ/ផ្សារ
3.	ត្រូវចេះប្រៀបធៀបមើលគុណភាព និងតម្លៃទំនិញពីអ្នកបោះដុំ/ លក់រាយគ្រប់ប្រភេទនៅតាមទីផ្សារ/ផ្សារ 
4.	ត្រូវទិញបន្លែ សាច់ គ្រឿងទេស ក្នុងបុងណាដែលត្រូវដឹកចេញទៅមុនគេជៀសវាងកុំឲ្យយឺតយ៉ាវ
5.	ក្នុងករណីបន្លែឡើងថ្លៃត្រូវរាយការណ៏មកកាន់ការិយាល័យដើម្បីកែតម្លៃក្នុងអ៊េប ( App ) និង តម្លៃទៅភ្ញៀវ
6.	ត្រូវចេះវេចខ្ចប់/ ច្រកថង់រាល់ទំនិញគ្រប់មុខអោយមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងងាយស្រួលដឹកជញ្ជូន
7.	ពេលទិញបន្លែហើយត្រូវយកតម្លៃបន្លែទាំងអស់ដែលបានទិញរួចប្រគល់ឲ្យអ្នកវាយបុងភ្លាមដើម្បីវាយបុងហើយរៀប
ឥវ៉ាន់ចេញដឹកឲ្យភ្ញៀវអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា
8.	ពេលទិញបន្លែរួចរាល់អស់ក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃត្រូវសរសេរបុង ដើម្បីទូទាត់កាចំណាយការទិញបន្លែក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ
9.	ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ជាមួយនិងក្រុមហ៊ុន និងមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ
10.	អាចធ្វើការផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនគ្នានៅចុងសប្តាហ៍និងនៅថ្ងៃសម្រាកបុណ្យទានផ្សេងៗតាមការពិភាក្សាក្រុម
11.	ការងារផ្សេងៗនឹងត្រូវចាត់ចែងដោយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់
Job Requirement:
១. កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី៩ ឡើងទៅ១២
២. ទាំងពីរភេទ និង អាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
៣. មានបទពិសោធការងារចាប់ពីរ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ រឺ មិនមានក៏ចរចារបាន
៤. អាចសរសេរភាសារខ្មែរបាន និង អង់គ្លេសបាន រិតតែល្អប្រសើរ
Staff Benefits:
១. ប្រាក់ខែចាប់ពី 250$ - 350$
២. ថ្លៃអាហារ១ថ្ងៃ 2.50$ 
៣. ម៉ោងធ្វើការ៨ម៉ោងក្នុង១ថ្ងៃ
៣. ១សប្តាហ៍ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ (Dayoff 1ថ្ងៃ)
៤. ឈប់សម្រាកពិធីបុណ្យធំៗ
៥. ទទួលបានអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត   

HOW TO APPLY:
Interested candidates please send your updated CV to Human Resources Department
Address: ផ្ទះលេខ ៥, ផ្លូវ ៤៧៥/៤០៦ , សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹក, ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង, រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ

Job Description:
១. មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងបែងចែកការបញ្ជាទិញអោយមានភាពរលូន និងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ ។
២. សម្របសម្រួល ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពបញ្ជាទិញរបស់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោម
៣. អនុវត្ត ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពទិញដើម្បីធានានូវសកម្មភាពផលិតកម្មប្រកប ដោយសុវត្ថិភាពនិងរលូន។ 
៤. បង្កើតនិងរក្សាស្តង់ដារខ្ពស់នៃការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់សម្រាប់សេវាកម្មដែលមាន  ប្រសិទ្ធិភាពថ្លៃដើមនិងពេញចិត្តបំផុត។ 
៥.ធ្វើកំណែទម្រង់និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពទិញដើម្បីធានានូវសកម្មភាព ផលិតកម្មប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាពនិងរលូន។ ។ 
៦. អនុវត្តរាល់បញ្ហាបញ្ជាទិញដោយធ្វើអន្តរកម្មជាមួយភាគីពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
៧. អភិវឌ្ឍនិងថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពជាមួយក្រុមការងារ អ្នកផ្តល់ទំនិញ  អ្នកកាម៉ង់ទំនិញ និង ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។
៨. បង្កើតនិងអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពអប់រំនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោមផ្នែក ដើម្បីបង្កើនចំណេះដឹងនិងជំនាញទាក់ទងនឹងការបញ្ជាទិញ។
៩. ត្រូវធានាថាការចំនាយថវិកា និង ទទួលថវិកា ប្រកបដោយតម្លាភាព ស្មោះត្រង់ ប្រសិទ្ធិភាព  និង ប្រសិទ្ធិផល សម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុនចុច១ ។
១០. ការងារទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗទៀត ត្រូវបានកំណត់ ដោយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិចុច១
១១. ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លម្អិតជូនទៅប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងចុច១ និង ក្រុមហ៊ុន
១២. បង្ហាត់បង្ហាញដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោមស្តីពីការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពទំនិញ ការចរចារតម្លៃ  និងការវេចខ្ចប់ដោយសុវត្ថិភាព
១៣. ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារអ្នកបញ្ជាទិញថ្នាក់ក្រោម សិក្សាស្វែងយល់អំពីប្រភេទសាច់ ផ្នែកនៃសាច់ និងបន្លែ ព្រមទាំងគ្រឿងទេសផ្សេងៗ (ទាំងផលិតផលក្នុងស្រុក និង នាំចូល)

Job Description:
1.	Ensure that the Purchasing Department records and checks all purchase so that the best quality and the best available price are obtained. 
2.	Inspect the receiving area periodically to verify that receiving procedures are being followed. 
3.	Inspect all store rooms at least once daily and personally check the items contained in the store room against bin cards, meat tags, etc. to ensure that store room procedures are being observed. 
4.	Prepare the daily Food and beverage sales and cost (daily flash cost) reports. 
5.	Ensure staff are accurately performing assigned work and that items for expense charges and correctly posted.
6.	Work with the Executive Chef to ensure that items listed on the menus are ordered and that supplies received are of the highest quality. 
7.	Update the menu-costing quarterly and report the result to the Food and Beverage manager with proposed sales prices and percentage cost of each dish. 
8.	Conduct food testing with the chef of new products available in the market. 
9.	Prepare food analysis when new menu items are added or when requested by the F&B/Kitchen Department.
10.	Conduct spot-checks on potion so that consistent portion sized are maintained. 
11.	Work with F&B Cashier Supervisor to ensure that all food/beverage taken out of kitchen/bars are supported by a captain’s order and that guest checks have correct prices.
12.	Take monthly inventories of food/beverage, general store room, and bars. 
13.	Finalize the month-end cost board by the 3-rd working day of the following month. 
14.	Complete the month-end report by the 6th working day of the following month. 
15.	Prepare a report on the comparison of the hotel’s prices with the leading competing hotels in the area, and submit to Management each month.
16.	Conduct market surveys twice a month and report the results to the Accounting Division Manager.
17.	Spot check the house-use/entertainment checks and reports to the Accounting Division Manager every month-end.
18.	Maintain the highest standards of discretion, honesty, business ethics and devotion to duty. 
19.	Complete other duties that are assigned by the Finance team/GM.
Job Requirement:
•At least BA degree in Accountant and related with basic accounting is better. 
•Both is preferred, Age between 25-35
•Minimum 1 years’ experience in above field or in similar position.
•Written and spoken proficiency in Khmer and English or Chinese will be advantaged.
•Able to work under pressure and work as a team.
•Computer literate - Microsoft word, Excel and Power point.
•Self-motivated to achieve high quality standard of food and beverage management.
•Strong interpersonal and high standard of customer service.
•Have good references as a leader that confident in leadership qualities
•Knowledge of the restaurant's facilities, layout and service standard.



*Staff Benefits:
•Working Hours 8 h /per day and 6 Days/ Weeks
•Salary Range 300$-450$
•Meal Allowance for Lunch 2.5$/ Per daay
•Holidays is followed labor law and company
•Public Holiday with 
•And have other benefits that staffs have good performance

Job Description:
•Oversee the smooth and efficient running of the Finance Department and Related with another Department
•Ensure all taxation and regulative requirements are complied with at all times.
•On a monthly basis conduct balance sheet reconciliation for review to Directors/ General Manager.

•Analyses business performance / results, providing feedback to Senior Management.

•Ensure that debtors are monitored and collections are consistent with set company time frames.

•Complete KPI assessment of direct reports within Company specified time frame.

•Strong leadership with managerial talent, able to coach and motivate all staff

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Heng Sokchan (Mr.)  070 555 494 / 017 735 688 #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh Bunthoeun.Keo@rmagroup.net 070 555 494 / 017 735 688

Job Description: ABOUT THE JOBThe position we are offering is full-time with flexible hours, reporting directly to the owner of LLFitness. Tasks include client communications and service, verification and reconciliation of transactions such as accounts payable and receivable, invoicing, and other financial duties as they occur. Further administrative responsibilities include maintenance of files and client data, drafting of client and partner correspondence, as well as support in the set-up of partnerships and services. As the role progresses, developing administrative systems and a proactive role in finding new solutions in advertising and business development may become more central. It should be noted that we are a small company and responsibilities may vary depending on projects as they occur. RESPONSIBILITIESThe responsibilities of this position include, but are not limited to:- Ensuring that all financial transactions are completed in accordance to LLFitness finance procedures- Tracking sales and finances, identifying weaknesses of and making improvements to the existing bookkeeping system- Maintain and update the membership database system- Providing support to management as required- Customer service: Greeting clients, dealing with enquiries, providing studio introductions- General administrative duties- Actively promote and sell the various memberships available at LLFitness- Ensuring the reception area is tidy and presentable and maintained to a high standard- Ordering supplies and merchandise and keeping inventory on stock.- Uphold safe and efficient workplace policies and practices- Ensuring the equipment and gym studio areas are clean and tidy and maintained to a high standard during each shift.- Resolve problems on the gym floor as and when they arise.- Contributing to the continuous improvement of the company through new ideas, critical review of the status quo and self-driven initiative to fuel change.
Job Requirement: Fluent English, Khmer is a plusComputer LiterateBasic BookkeepingConfident with Microsoft Office & Google ApplicationsQuick Learning, including SoftwareExcellent Organisational SkillsExcellent Writing SkillsHigh Level of Critical Thinking Experience with Websites (WIX) a PlusAble to Work in a Team and IndependentlySolution-Based Problem SolvingQuality Focused

job title: Manager/Head, Retail and Personal Credit Risks
position: Manager/Head, Retail and Personal Credit Risks
Job Description: Summary of Position:  The position is responsible for the overall management of the Retail and Personal Credit Risk department of the bank. This includes credit assessment and decision, monitoring, portfolio management, credit capacity building for bank staff, preparation and maintenance of credit-related policy, procedures, forms, and templates.  Duties and Responsibilities:  Lead the respective credit risk department to be effectively and efficiently functioning with a particular focus on retail credit (including SME and home loan) and personal credit risks. Provide overall strategic direction for the team while supporting the business strategy of the bank.Manage loan approval process within the delegated authority to ensure good loan quality, compliance, and timely delivery. This includes loan review, assessment, recommendation, and/or approval.Involve in business strategy initiatives, providing tailor-made credit risk solutions to support business decisions.Provide credit workshops or advisory consultation in relation to loan structuring and preparation to the credit sale team.Conduct structured credit pieces of training for staff and credit lesson learned workshops.Lead the team to collect, update and analyze required information to contribute to the improvement of credit policy, procedures, property price index, and industry paper/research.Develop and review the Retail and Personal Credit Policies and ProceduresInitiate improvement to reporting, process, credit procedures, and/or policies. Develop effective loan assessment tools such as checklists, templates, forms, etc.Develop new initiatives to increase efficiency and optimize processes and proceduresRegularly enforce compliance with relevant policies and procedures and liaise with internal and external auditors where required. Properly implement related audits and quality assurance finding responses.Monitor the overall loan portfolio including NPL, concentration risks, industry risk, etc. to be in line with the bank’s risk appetite. Regularly monitor risk appetite and key risk indicators.Monitor Pre-NPL and NPL trends. Facilitate loan early alert management process. Provide recommendations to sale, collection, credit analysis, and involved teams to resolve delinquent loans.Actively support the overall risk management of the bank.  Analyze arising risks that can have an impact on the Bank.Develop, generate, monitor, and present reports to the management.Provide coaching and establish performance standards for personnel within the department.Perform other tasked assigned by the line manager
Job Requirement: Profile and Qualifications: Relevant Bachelor’s Degree in Finance/Banking or other related equivalenceMinimum 5-year banking experience in credit-related fields eg. credit sales, credit analysis, credit quality assurance, underwriting, credit risk, etc.Knowledge of conventional and structured banking productsDemonstrate strong strategic thinking, analytical, and leadership skills

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Nhong Korane  070 960 666 job@chamroeun.com #425, St. 271, Sangkat Toul Tompong II, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 960 666

Job Description:
** Duties
- Assist to examine all kind of patients and treat them for diseases in acute or chronic, critical or stable conditions.
- Provide good consultation with patients and families to ensure that care is consistent with their expectations.
- Perform high quality patient evaluations, including thorough histories and physical examinations, which are documented in the patient medical chart.
- Assist in operating all surgeries to patients.
- Coordinate care with specialist and other healthcare providers as needed.
- Demonstrate respect for patients and their families. Continually look to improve patient care.
- Ensure compliance with established hospital policies, procedures, objectives, safety environmental and infection control.
- Follow the policies and procedures that guide and support the clinical staff.
- Perform other duties as required by General Manager of Clinic.
Job Requirement:
- Hold a Doctor degree in Medicine, priority for Doctor Specialist in ORL, Diabetes, Pediatrics or Genecology and Obstetric or Traumatology or Dermatology, recognized by Cambodian Ministry of Education or recognize international Health Service.
- Completed Ultrasound Training Course (preferably and priority)
- At least 2 years work experience serving as medical doctor.
- Must understand, speak, and write English at an intermediate level
- Willing to learn and work under supervision of specialist doctors
- Ability to work under pressure
- Frequently seeks advice from supervising physicians, frequently consults textbooks or other learning

Job Description:
About Lexmin Pty Ltd:
- Lexmin is a new organic agriculture company based in Phnom Penh
- Over the years the company has evolved into a value-added producer to cultivate Moringa organically and combines ancient Indian Vedic agricultural methods with state-of-the-art, ultra-high-density cultivation
techniques.
- Lexmin is also a food products manufacturer, mainly on Moringa and Moringa-based health supplements and products such as Moringa Powder, Moringa Tablets and Moringa Tea, followed by a variety of other Moringa-based products.
- Our dynamic and growing company is passion driven, continuously striving to achieve the highest world-class
quality of products

Summary of Core Duties:
- In charge with total marketing collateral designing online and offline needs, printing and handling for
Lexmin and across the board under the group and required by Group CEO.
- Artwork retouching, resizing and file checking based on production printing requirement.
- Designing or artwork and content imaging for all marketing, promotional and products.
- In charge with designing of: Posters, Facebook layout, Leaflet, Flyer, product labelling, packaging and other marketing collaterals.
- Video content creating and editing for marketing collaterals such as company video, Vlog, promotional
videos etc.
- Good understanding of the printing guideline to suits different products in terms of visual and safety aspects
- In charge and support the marketing team with any other design and artwork requests internally and externally.
- Assist with Digital Marketing.
Job Requirement:
- Proficient in adobe creative cloud e.g: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign (Candidate will be
tested on designing knowledge and skills during interview)
- Medium to high level of knowledge in videography: video editing, video content creator.
- Knowledge in photography and product shooting.
- Computer literacy and knowledge in I.T and/or tech support will be an added advantage
- Ability to work in a team and independently under tight deadlines
- Possess your own transport

VACANCY DETAILS:
- Available immediately.
- Candidate must possess at least a Professional Certificate, Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Art/Design/Creative Multimedia or equivalent
- Required language(s): English & Khmer
- At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
- Candidate with design, video and photography knowledge will be given priority
- Salary commensurate with experience

Job Description:
- To ensure the smooth operation of Khmer Academic Section.
- Establish and promote high standards and expectations for all teachers and all students in terms of disciplines, high moral standards, academic excellence, and character development.
- Work closely with teacher to organize the classroom and lessons to optimize the student learning and develop a positive and professional relationship with each of his/her students, assess their strengths and weaknesses and take these into account when planning lessons.
- Check lesson planning of all teachers every week.
- Collaborate with the provide feedback with teachers on their weekly and termly plans.
- Work with teachers and admin staff to ensure the attainment of necessary Academic teaching and learning resources and general class materials within desired budget.
- Work cooperatively with the faculty members, the school administration and the Principal to promote team work spirit.
- To maintain student discipline and to follow through with correspondence and record keeping relating to discipline.
- To be responsible for the Curriculum Development and the implementation of the respective programe.
- To implement the grading and the reporting standards and methods used by teachers in measuring student achievement.
- Conduct parents and students counselling by the schedule.
- Prepare a weekly report and send to the NP Principal.
- Collaborate with IP staff in fulfilling shared KPI goals.
- Support with school events.

job title: គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាខ្មែរ កំរិតបឋមសិក្សា និង មតេយ្យសិក្សា
position: គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាខ្មែរ កំរិតបឋមសិក្សា និង មតេយ្យសិក្សា
Job Description:
- រៀបចំកម្មវិធីសិក្សា កាលវិភាគ​ សៀវភៅកត់ត្រាផ្សេងៗ សៀវភៅបញ្ជីអវត្តមាន កំណត់ត្រាបង្រៀន ការបង្រៀនបន្ថែមផ្សេងៗ
- រៀបចំវិញ្ញាសារ ការប្រលងប្រចាំខែ ឬ ប្រចាំឆមាស
- គ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារៈសិក្សាទាំងអស់ រួមទាំងរាល់សកម្មភាពនៅពេលចូលបណ្ណាល័យ
- រៀបចំកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់ សាលារៀនហែរ៉ុដស៍អន្តរជាតិ អោយស្របទៅនឹង កម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់សាលារដ្ឋ
- គ្រប់គ្រងវិន័យ និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់បង្រៀនសិស្សនៅក្នុងថ្នាក់
- រៀបចំ និងច្នៃប្រឌិតសម្ភារៈសម្រាប់បង្រៀន
- រៀបចំទុកដាក់ ឯកសារផ្សេងៗរបស់សិស្សអោយបានល្អ និងធ្វើការរៀបចំជួបប្រជុំជាមួយមាតាបិតាសិស្សានុសិស្ស​ ៤ដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ
- ផ្តល់ជូនសិស្សានុសិស្សនូវការអប់រំ អំពីក្រមសីលធម៌ និងសុខភាព នៅក្នុងពេលបង្រៀន
- ចូលរួមក្នុងការប្រជុំរដ្ឋបាលផ្សេងៗ​ ប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេស និងការប្រជុំទូទៅជាមួយនាយកសាលាជាប្រចាំ
- ចូលរួមជាមួយព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលា ទាំងព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ ដួចជាទិវាម្ហូបអាហារអន្តរជាតិ ពិធីបុណ្យហាឡូវិន និងពិធីបុណ្យអំទូក។ល។
- រៀបចំដំណើរការទស្សនៈកិច្ចសិក្សាសម្រាប់សិស្សានុសិស្ស
- និងការងារផ្សេងៗដែលត្រូវបានស្នើរដោយនាយកសាលា
Job Requirement:
** កំរិវប្បធម៏
- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រអប់រំ
- មានគរុកោសល្យក្នុងការបង្រៀន

** បទពិសោធន៍ និងជំនាញ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនយ៉ាងតិចពីរឆ្នាំជាមួយសាលាអន្តរជាតិ
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អរវាង អ្នករួមការងារ និងអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
- មានសមត្ថភាពប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យួទ័រ Word, Excel, Power Point, outlook and internet)

** អាកប្បកិរិយា
- មានការតាំងចិត្តលើការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍កុមារ
- មានចំណង់ចំនូលចិត្តក្នុងការបង្រៀន
- ខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងធ្វើការ និងការរៀបចំខ្លួន
- មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត

** ប្រាក់ខែនិង​អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់ជូនដោយផ្អែក ទៅគោលការណ៍របស់សាលា​ ហើយអត្ថប្រយោជន៍បានកំណត់ដោយគោលនយោបាយផ្ទៃក្នុង។ប្រាក់ខែនិង​អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទាំងនេះត្រូវតែបានពិនិត្យនិងយល់ព្រម ដោយនិយោជិត និង និយោជក។

** ទំនាក់ទំនងលំអិត៖​ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប មកកាន់ អ៊ីម៉ែលដូចខាងក្រោម

Job Description:
•	Site supervisor to prepare tender and contract documents, including BOQ 
•	(bills of quantities) with the architect
•	Oversee site entitlement and due diligence effort for multiple new construction
•	Participate in project scoping and budgeting of remodel projects
•	Responsible for overseeing the planning, development and execution of project deliverable lead project planning, budgeting, action plans and monitoring processes
•	Present reports containing details regarding the project’s progress.
•	Prepare for project planning, and identification of resources needed.
•	Coordinate the efforts of all parties involved in the project, which include the architects, consultants, contractors, sub-contractors and laborers.
•	Monitor the progress of the construction activities on a regular basis and hold regular status meetings with all the sub-teams.
•	Manage workers’ daily performance and solve the problem.
•	Ensure work quality of construction and in accordance with time lines of the project.
Job Requirement:

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកថែទាំ និងជួសជុល (Maintenance Officer) : 2 នាក់
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកថែទាំ និងជួសជុល (Maintenance Officer) : 2 នាក់
Job Description:
•	អនុវត្តតាមកាលវិភាគជួសជុលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងថែទាំទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវកិច្ចការថែទាំ-ជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង
•	សម្របសម្រួល តាមដាន និងដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហា ដែលកើតឡើងដោយសារប្រព័ន្ធទឹក និងភ្លើង តាមហាង
•	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សកម្មភាព និងសមិទ្ធិផល
•	គោរពពេលវេលា និង ទំនួសខុសត្រូវចំពោះការងារតំហែទំានិង ជួសជុលតាមហាង
•	គោរពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធាន និងប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
Job Requirement:
•	ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្របច្ចេកទេស ឬសមមូលផ្នែក អគ្គីសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក និង ជួសជុលម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
•	ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកថែទាំ និងជួសជុលទូទៅយ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	ត្រូវមានចិត្តអំណត់ និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ
•	អាចធ្វើការឆ្លាស់ម៉ោងបាន
•	អាចធ្វើដំណើរទៅក្រៅបាន

Job Description:
- Supporting the manager to implement the strategic plan to promotes Wing ecosystem including new products, acquisition and usage for Local Card Payment (Wingpay, Wingpoints, CCPay, Cobranding cards, etc.)
- Analyze and report the performance on a regular basis (weekly/ monthly) and need to have the ability to design the go-to-market plan of campaigns/ initiatives that will address performance gaps or improve the performance to achieve the target
- Ability to advocate the product internally and externally for the full picture and awareness so to gain the support from all stakeholders
- Initiate performance/ product survey/ research independently or lead agency to Identify the gap and give strategic recommendations to achieve the business objectives.
Job Requirement:
- BA/ MBA in Marketing or Management or Economics
- At least 3 years’ experience in marketing, management, analytics..
- Knowledge in Brand/ product / portfolio management
- Marketing management
- Project management
- Business communications
- FinTech/ banking
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
-	Provide 24 hours System Health and alarm reporting utilizing network monitoring and report at H.O, DC and DR system.
-	Review and general clean-up of Monitoring and Ticket system.
-	Manager and maintain the Zabbix Monitoring system (these report on the status and performance of network, ISP service and facilities).
-	Fault handling and escalation within ticket systems
-	Incident report and system performance reports delivery
-	Centralize contact point when all system problem or incident occurs 
-	Develop, Manage/customize other system as required
-	Provide a good security of service and application security concept 
-	Work closely with application developers, Infrastructure team to find solutions and finalize the root cause for any incident occurred.
-	Keep incident and problem record for IT & Risk department.
-	Provide technical support for IT systems.
-	Analyse and implement requirements for system and application and reporting enhancements.
-	Develop, maintain and implement measures of any system performance and identify areas of improvement for efficiency, stability and security.
-	Apply automation principals whenever possible.

-	Knowledgeable of Windows, Linux and UNIX.
-	Knowledgeable of programming like PHP and JAVA
-	Knowledgeable of database like MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQL Server
-	Ability to assess and prioritise faults and respond or escalate accordingly

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities:

Responsible for cross-functional business initiatives that enhance customer experience, decrease Digital Banking, and increase overall efficiency. This leader is responsible for delivering common services across Business. By providing leadership, strategic planning experience, and executive business support, this role will initially focus on building a high-performing Shared Services team that will be the foundation for important business outcomes across Business that include, but are not limited to:
focused investments that strengthen customer satisfaction; increased digitization and automation; drive innovation and a culture committed to continuous improvement.
•	Influence and navigate across the business, driving the right outcomes based on business needs
•	Lead the following centralized program activities: including Business Process Management, Third-Party Digital Banking Management, Complaints, Self Assurance Activities, Model Digital Banking Management, Policy Management, Digital Properties, New Product Initiatives, Change Management, Audit and Exam Management
•	Maintain a holistic view of activities across the business and ensure that issues are proactively identified, addressed appropriately, measured, and escalated (when necessary)
•	Ensure activities are consistent with the Enterprise Digital Banking frameworks, policies, and programs and Digital Banking appetite framework; and to ensure they are well-calibrated and integrated within the line of business
•	Manage relationships and foster a team orientation with business heads, SVP, team, independent
•	Digital Banking management, legal, and audit
•	Build a high performing organization and ensure proper staffing and expertise exists at the line of business level and build capabilities, processes, and teams that meet heightened Digital Banking management expectations
•	Other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements:

•	Educated to Bachelor degree level and/or equivalent experience/qualifications
•	6-8+ years of management experience
•	10+ years of experience in one or more of the following functional areas: business process, quality assurance, strategic planning, or project management
•	Excellent knowledge of Financial Markets, Banking Industry, Digital Platforms, and products or significant exposure to equities products within a similar environment
•	Understanding of Strategy, Digital & Innovation business operations, processes, products, and customer interactions and where they manifest Digital Banking
•	 Meaningful knowledge across enterprise Digital Banking management framework, including Digital Banking identification, Digital Banking appetite, and strategy, Digital Banking-related decisions, processes and controls, Digital Banking analytics and governance
•	Understanding of best-practice Digital Banking management techniques across the financial services industry
•	Knowledge of relevant financial regulations and understanding of how they are implemented, managed, and enforced
•	Deep understanding of Digital Banking framework, corporate/business policies, and programs to translate into plans for the business, function, and/or Digital Banking type
•	Experience in a Regulatory Reporting environment or exposure to position/transaction processes/life-cycle, including involvement in building new systems to meet complex reporting requirements, is helpful
•	Proven leadership and project management skills to drive alignment across stakeholder groups to develop and deliver repeatable end to end Digital Banking management solutions and controls aligned with business/customer processes
•	Proven ability to build and lead high performing Digital Banking management organization in a matrixed environment, ensure proper staffing and expertise exists and can coach and enable others in Digital Banking management and Digital Banking ownership
•	Excellent oral and written c

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities:

Segment Expertise:

•	Support the Strategic Partnerships and Innovation executive team in developing the
•	overall group strategy, specifically for Digital Commerce
•	Identify strategic opportunities for Chip Mong Bank capabilities through a strong
•	understanding of the segment and customer's business needs, leveraging Chip Mong
•	Bank solutions across all product platforms.
•	Continuously review market landscape, identifying developing partnership or
•	acquisition opportunities that will position Chip Mong Bank as the market leader

Account Management:

•	Develop and execute customized account strategy, objectives, and plans to increase revenue and market share for select strategic partner accounts
•	Lead the account and relationship management and sales plan for these accounts, ensuring that the client’s business objectives are met
•	Working with the innovation team: recommend, develop, and implement new and creative approaches to grow the client’s business
•	Align the cross-functional teams on key proposals including representation from Legal, Marketing, Product, Operations, Market Research, and Technology.
•	Lead the development, negotiation, and signing of proposals by working with various internal stakeholders and relationships with strategic partner executives

Execution:

•	Work with cross-functional teams to ensure partner implementations are on track and delivering against plan
•	Take the lead in solving the problems that arise during the execution of programs with partners
•	Proactively identify and solve complex problems that impact the management, relationship, and direction of the business

Communication:

•	Report to and interact with senior management and executives to indicate the status of the partnership progress
•	Foster in-depth and productive relationships at all levels with the client and the Chip Mong Bank organization
•	Proactively educate the Chip Mong Bank organization on market developments and partner opportunities
•	Other tasks assigned by management

•	Proven record of implementing strategic initiatives, policies, and operational decisions
•	Strategic thinking and thought leadership
•	Teamwork, interpersonal & relationship-building skills, and ability to lead by influence and example
•	Proven ability to partner, communicate and manage/navigate through multiple disciplines and organizational groups
•	Experience “managing up”, building Executive Level communications, and delivering presentations
•	Ability to work within a complex and often ambiguous environment, and to influence senior management and other relevant parties
•	Bachelor’s degree required;
•	Executive presence; Strong written and oral communication, including large-group presentations
•	Team-oriented, collaborative, and flexible
•	Ability to influence and work within a matrixed environment

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities:

•	Apply product management best practices to creatively solve complex, ambiguous, and novel problems.
•	Owning the vision, product strategy, and delivery of new products
•	Maintain a robust delivery schedule in partnership with the Engineering team.
•	Build consensus with business partners and senior managers on feature priority decisions
•	Back decisions with data & metrics
•	Partner with the design team members to ensure a phenomenal user experience
•	Partner with the engineering team, product peers, business stakeholders to adjust product priorities
•	Keep stakeholders, senior managers informed on delivery progress, blockers and present decision points to drive the debate.
•	Define inspiring product visions in the retail and business banking space from identified customer and end-user needs.
•	Identify new solutions, enhancement opportunities, or product gaps that exist in our current solution portfolio and make the case for investment and prioritize resources to deliver on our business outcomes.
•	Lead story writing, backlog refinement, and definition of Roadmaps that tie to your products, working with customers and partners to deliver on the defined vision of Card Management and Conversational Banking within a broader product strategy.
•	Work across the organization to ensure functional alignment for all solution readiness elements necessary to ensure a product or solution is ready for general availability in the market.
•	Work with NCR Alliances, Sales, and Relationship Management teams to define Go-to-Market approaches for new solutions and support engagements to enable customer strategies.
•	Participate in regular sprint planning, collaboration with scrum teams, daily status meetings, and acceptance testing.
•	Provide support on strategy, vision, and direction for successful pre-sales engagement and ongoing client collaboration to grow the relationship.
•	Accountable for all market-related performance metrics, including sales, revenues and margin, product quality, and customer satisfaction.
•	Represent your products and vision externally with clients/prospects, analysts, and consultants.
•	Product and Process note exposer and experience.
•	Perform other tasks assigned by a business head or top management

Other Desired Qualifications

•	Gain a deep understanding of the customer experience especially in the context of the market best practices, identify and fill product gaps, generate new ideas that grow market share, and drive growth.
•	Manage the entire product lifecycle from strategic planning through go-to-market while working closely with the product line manager to provide insight and requirements from the market.
•	Identifies product market opportunities through market research, customer profiling needs analysis, market sizing, and competitive analysis.
•	Serves as the key contact for product questions and new product ideas which surface from customers, sales, or market research.
•	Lead the engagement with the banks in the US as the first priority
•	Identifies and analyzes critical issues related to the product design and promotion of the product(s).
•	Translates product strategy into recommendations and feature definition to address market opportunities.
•	Provides overall direction for product enhancements and general product development requirements.
•	Works with the product marketing department to develop effective communication activities and programs including product positioning and collateral development
•	Lead product focus groups
•	Lead user conference sessions and general industry topics.
•	Develop and implement methods and procedures for monitoring projects such as preparation of records of expenditures and research findings, progress reports, and staff conferences, in order to inform management of current project status.
•	Manages the resolution of escalated customer problems. Escalates problems and issues to other departments when needed.
•	Develops proper and thorough documentation (internal and external) describing enhancements as appropriate.
•	Identifies continuous improvement opportunities for Product Management processes.
•	Vendor Management including maintaining a directory of vendors with contact information and other pertinent data as well as analyzing potential future partner relationships.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements:
•	At least a bachelor’s degree in Business, IT, Finance, Marketing, or related field relevant to and/or aspects of roles described above
•	At least 5 years of experience in the digital banking field 
•	Ability to Influence/relationship management Skills
•	Strong communication in English (written and oral)
•	Eye for detail
•	Familiarity with Digital, social media & Mobility platforms (Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.) is a must.
•	At least some Fintech/ Digital Banking /eCommerce Experience
•	Technical background
•	Go-getter
•	Individual role thus needs a strong mindset
•	Result oriented
•	Analytical/Logical bent of mind

Job Description:
Job responsibilities and duties:
Internal/External Interactions: 
•	Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
•	Planning and Daily visits new customers\
•	More regular, planned, and structured visit to provincial customers 
•	Joint Target to improve groups performance in sales, penetration, and profit
•	Joint calls to large Target fleet customers
•	Weekly meeting with Lending Manager/Senior Collection Officer/Senior Loan Recovery Officer about default customers and review previous months performance
•	Weekly meeting with Lending Manager to review previous months performance
•	Collect quality applicant rather than quantity by doing careful credit assessment for approval request
•	Train and coach sales team of dealers about financing 
•	Ensure the effective communication maintained among team and other departments
•	Report and update to the Dealer sale team about the application status
•	Find out key potential growth of sale and recommend this to management
•	Support recovery team and collection team if needed 
•	Manage and delegate tasks to lending coordinator 
•	Attend trainings as required by the management
Job Requirement:
Job requirements and qualifications:
Education/Certification:
•	Bachelor or Master degree in business management or related field
•	At least two years of experience in the similar position
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience:
ESSENTIAL:
•	Multi tasks and strong organizational skill
•	Good in problem solving
•	Analytical skills
OTHERS:
•	Creative, result-driven, able to take initiative.
•	Business Management Ethic
•	Strong  team player
•	Good in problem solving
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile: 致立投资集团有限公司（以下简称致立集团）成立于1998年，总部位于中国广东省东莞市。旗下企业包括东莞致立节能机电有限公司、惠州致立机电有限公司、香港保志实业有限公司、柬埔寨致立机电有限公司、柬埔寨华南达机电有限公司、柬埔寨荣泰贸易有限公司、印度尼西亚致立机电有限公司等，是一家实力雄厚的多元化新型民营企业。凭借在机电行业丰富的生产技和销售经验，与国际一流品牌合作，为客户提供高品质的石油产品和完善的电力系统集成解决方案。公司业务遍及于中国和东南亚地区，客户群涵盖航空运输、电信、矿山、油田、房地产、酒店娱乐、制造业、养殖业等众多行业。

Company Profile: Manulife is a leading Canada-based financial services group with principal operations in Asia, Canada and the United States. Clients look to Manulife for strong, reliable, trustworthy and forward-thinking solutions for their most significant financial decisions. Our international network of employees, agents and distribution partners offers financial protection and wealth management products and services to millions of clients. We also provide asset management services to institutional customers. At the end of June 2016, we had US$718 billion in assets under management and administration, and in the previous 12 months we made more than US25.4 billion in benefits, interest and other payments to our customers. Our group of companies operates as Manulife in Canada and Asia and primarily as John Hancock in the United States. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as 'MFC' on the TSX, NYSE and PSE, and under '945' on the SEHK. We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.

Job Description:
The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We believe in the value of empowering Specialist, Call Center Representative with the resources to solve critical problems for the future of our business, which is why we need you.

Specialist, Call Center Representative duties and responsibilities include: 
Customer Focus, Data Entry Skills, Building Relationships, People Skills, Problem Solving, Strong phone and verbal communication skills along with active listening, Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types, Ability to multi-task, set priorities and manage time effectively stress tolerance, high energy level.
  
What motivates you?  
• You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit  
• You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile mindset and enable business outcomes  
• You thrive in teams, and enjoy getting things done together 
• You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters  
• You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up 
• You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone 

On the job you will:
• Handle customer inquiries both by telephone, email and other means of communication
• Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls such as and not limited to Customer welcome calls, premium reminder call, and lapsed survey call
• Answers customer inquiries by providing valid and accurate information on a first call resolution
• Follow company’s call “scripts” when handling different types of calls 
• Identify customers’ needs and provide solutions and/or alternatives if cannot resolve during the first call, escalate unresolved problems immediately to management and follow up to ensure resolution is met 
• Build relationships and engage customers by taking the extra mile to provide pleasant customer experience 
• Maintains call center database 
• Provide customers with product and service information
• Enter new customer information into system
• Update existing customer information 
• Follow up customer calls where necessary
• Document all call information according to standard operating procedures
• Complete call logs
• Produce call reports such as monthly report, weekly report and daily report
• Update the complaints log 
• Other tasks assigned by management

Our commitment to you  
• Our mission; to be a part of making Decisions Easier and Lives Better 
• A leadership team dedicated to your growth and success  
• A bold ambition and set of goals to be a leader in driving transformation in our industry  
• Our best. Every day.  
• We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.
Job Requirement:
We are looking for someone with:  
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and solutioning skills  
• A capacity for constant learning from both success and failure  
• Open to change and continuous improvement  
  
Nice to Haves:   
• Bachelor degree in Business, Finance or related field is preferred
• Requires relevant work experience of 2 Years
• Computer literate in MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint
• Team Work, focused, results driven, professional maturity, and self-confidence
• Work efficiently and accurately and able to work under pressure and independently, a team player who is self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision
• Have a strong character and able to consider and advice on the consequences of various courses of action
• Detail oriented with patience on detail paper works and record setup in system
• High comfort level working in a diverse environment 

Learn more about opportunities with us at jobs.manulife.com. Join us now!

Interested applicants meeting the above requirements should submit their CVs, covering letters and National ID card by going to this link: http://www.manulife.com.kh/Corporate-Careers-Career-Possibilities and follow each of its step. 
For more details please contact Mr. Dy David via David_Dy@manulife.com. Or Ms. Choury Chim via Choury_Chim@manulife.com. Application should be submitted before 25th February 2021.  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Job Description:
The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We believe in the value of empowering Insurance Specialist with the resources to solve critical problems for the future of our business, which is why we need you.  

The Insurance Specialist is responsible for providing life insurance solutions to Bank's clients. He/she will work in coordination with branch sales and service teams; thus, we are looking for a dynamic individual, who has an independent mindset and the drive to succeed. 

What motivates you?  
• You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit  
• You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile mindset and enable business outcomes  
• You thrive in teams, and enjoy getting things done together 
• You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters  
• You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up 
• You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone 

On the job you will:  
• The Insurance Specialist is responsible for providing life insurance solutions to Bank's clients   
• Work closely with branch sales and service teams to provide innovative product solutions to address client's protection, and long-term saving needs   
• Strengthen the long-term relationships with clients by providing excellent customer service   
• Perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
We are looking for someone with:  
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and solutioning skills  
• A capacity for constant learning from both success and failure  
• Open to change and continuous improvement  
  
Nice to Haves:   
• Candidate prefer Bachelor's/ College Degree holder  
• Work experience in bancassurance sales is highly preferred for this position but those with sales and customer service experience gained from banking, transport, pharmaceutical, FMCG, hospitality and IT industries are also encouraged to apply   
• Must be self-driven and highly motivated    

 Our commitment to you  
• Our mission; to be a part of making Decisions Easier and Lives Better 
• A leadership team dedicated to your growth and success  
• A bold ambition and set of goals to be a leader in driving transformation in our industry  
• Our best. Every day.  
• We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.  

Learn more about opportunities with us at jobs.manulife.com. Join us now!  
 
Interested applicants meeting the above requirements should submit their CVs, covering letters and National ID card by going to this link: http://www.manulife.com.kh/Corporate-Careers-Career-Possibilities and follow each of its step. 
For more details please contact Mr. Dy David via David_Dy@manulife.com. Or Ms. Choury Chim via Choury_Chim@manulife.com. Application should be submitted before 25th February 2021.  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Company Profile: Manulife is a leading Canada-based financial services group with principal operations in Asia, Canada and the United States. Clients look to Manulife for strong, reliable, trustworthy and forward-thinking solutions for their most significant financial decisions. Our international network of employees, agents and distribution partners offers financial protection and wealth management products and services to millions of clients. We also provide asset management services to institutional customers. At the end of June 2016, we had US$718 billion in assets under management and administration, and in the previous 12 months we made more than US25.4 billion in benefits, interest and other payments to our customers. Our group of companies operates as Manulife in Canada and Asia and primarily as John Hancock in the United States. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as 'MFC' on the TSX, NYSE and PSE, and under '945' on the SEHK. We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.

Job Description:
** What you will do

Clik is on the hunt for a passionate designer with the enthusiasm to deliver creative solutions within an evolving platform. We’re looking for someone who can take direction from written or spoken ideas and convert them into highly usable interfaces following a UX design standard. 

You will be working under the direction of our Product Owner and UX Lead to create amazing interfaces for both web and mobile app solutions. 


Some of the projects you may be asked to complete include: 

- Creating wireframes and prototypes in tools such as Adobe XD 
- Working closely with the UX Lead and Development team in creating app features through usability testing 
- Working with other designers to create demo videos 
- Assisting the marketing team in providing UI elements for advertising
Job Requirement:
** What we are looking for 

We are looking for a motivated individual who will be responsible for taking projects from concept to completion, with a focus on usability. While experience in all fields is ideal, if you’re a driven individual who is willing to learn, we’re willing to help you train along the way. 

** A strong candidate will have: 

- A sharp eye for style, trends and clean designs.  
- Exposure to or proficiency with the Adobe creative suite, particularly Adobe XD (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign and Microsoft office are nice to have as well)  
- Understanding of product branding, layout, colour and typography.  
- An ability to prioritise multiple projects, work unsupervised and meet deadlines. 
- A basic portfolio that reflects your skills as a designer and your style.  
- Graphic design qualifications or proof of experience. 


Perks of joining Clik

Room to grow 
Our senior team is willing to lend guidance to help you improve your skill set as well as provide you with training resources. As a start-up there will be plenty of opportunities for career progression.  

A fun and dynamic work culture
We aim to hire people who fit well with our office culture, so you’ll be surrounded by like-minded people who believe in the mantra, “work hard, play hard”.  

Silicon Valley style workplace
Our offices are currently undergoing an upgrade but once completed you will be working in a highly stimulating environment with access to new hardware and software to make your job easier and more efficient. 

Appealing bonus and benefits
Extensive training, insurance, flexible holidays, cash bonuses, phone bill, paternity leave and more – at Clik we strongly believe in employee welfare.
Company Profile:
We are an internationally-funded FinTech start-up looking for the brightest minds in Cambodia. Working with some of the biggest names in the industry, we’ve created a new digital payment solution that will revolutionise the local market before taking on the region.

We're ready to take our business to the next level and for that we need you! The sooner you join our team, the greater the benefits you’ll receive. We are committed to become a world-class organisation and only the sky’s the limit.

Our team is comprised of local and international professionals who are focused on innovation and excellence. We want to put Cambodia on the map in the FinTech sector, and as our global investors agree, Clik is the answer.

school

Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. PSE has six main programmes adapted to the needs of the children, those programmes include: food, health, protection, education and schooling, vocational training, and helping families. PSE help children more than 6,500 and 3000 families. We are operating in Phnom Penh, Sihanouk Ville and Siem Reap.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017 888 349

Job Description: Job PurposeWith the implementation of our Distributor Management Project, our Finance department is currently looking for committed officer(s) ensuring smooth implementation with all of our distributors nationwide. The DMO(s) are expected to work with our department achieving this by: 1.	Proactively work with Commercial Business Control team to fully comprehend the policies and other key accountabilities required. 2.	Ensuring the key deliverables regarding the implementation of this project. 3.	Effectively support the distributor’s owner to fully aware of the newly initiative with on-going support from CBL. 4.	Provide and ensure on-time communication for any further updates to be informed to all the distributors and vice versa. Job Responsibilitiesa.	Ensure accuracy of daily invoicing of CBL’s agent by ensuring agent issues invoices right after goods out of warehouse b.	Ensure stocks at agent’s warehouse matched with stocks recorded in DIS system. c.	Monthly verify the Detail Sale Table and Stocks Movement Listing for further submissiond.	Daily update Compliance Supervisor on any arising issues of the assigned warehouse and ensure end-to-end communication with no leakage information.  e.	Participate in monthly meeting(s) and other required trainings to further discuss about the on-going progress of tax compliance of agents, seek further supports, receive latest updates, and other required trainings provided by CBL. f.	Other responsibilities as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement: Specific Knowledge/skills:1.	Be able to use Ms. Office (Words, Excel) and emails.2.	Ability to handle any required tasks with specific deadline(s). 3.	Flexible, attention to details, and able to work under pressure.4.	Ability to work both independently and as a team, within and across teams.5.	Can-do attitude with a commitment to learn and grow with HEINEKEN
Company Profile:
The HEINEKEN Company, the world's most international brewer who was formerly known as Cambodia Brewery Limited (CBL). The company was established in Cambodia in 1994 as a joint-venture between Asia Pacific Brewery Limited and Progress Import-Export Company, before becoming 100% HEINEKEN in 2014. 

A career with HEINEKEN offers great challenges combined with exciting opportunities to own and grow your career in line with your aspirations.

HEINEKEN has over 85,000 internationally diverse, dynamic, committed and entrepreneurial employees working in over 70 countries on over 300 brands.

HEINEKEN Cambodia offers several exciting packages including:
- Company Transportation (30 mins from PP)
- Healthy Lunch @our Canteen
- 13th month salary
- Various performance bonuses 
- Insurance plans (Personal Accident & Group Hospital & Surgical)
- Company clinic (with Certified doctors and nurse)
- Training & development programs
- Oversea Training and international assignment opportunities
- Personal Development Plan and more.

Interested candidates shall submit their Application through our Online Application:
careers.theheinekencompany.com/Cambodia/

or send CV & Cover Letter to: hrrecruitments@heineken.com

Company Profile: Kfour Group Ltd, founded by Cambodian national in 1994, is one of the leading authorized retail and wholesale of electronic companies in Cambodia. Job Description:
Summary of Position:
The Marketing Executive is responsible for overseeing day-to-day marketing activities of the company.  He/she will organize marketing campaigns according to the trends. 

Duties and Responsibilities:
•Drafting and implementing effective marketing communication campaigns.
•Conducting initial research and analysing data to identify and define audiences
•Copy writing on marketing collateral, including brochures, letters, emails, press releases, websites and social media platforms. 
•Monitoring social media platforms and managing marketing campaigns
•Creating a marketing campaign, events schedule.
•Monitoring ongoing campaign expenditures against the budget, keeping accurate records and highlighting where variances occur.
•Producing an accurate summary of total expenditure at the end of each marketing campaign.
•Undertaking detailed ongoing analysis of marketing campaigns to ensure targets are met.
•Assisting in the production of marketing materials
•Organising events, and acting as event coordinator when necessary
•Assisting in sales strategies development/business development when necessary to ensure sales target is achieved 
•Assisting in engagement strategies for corporates, travel agencies, OTAs to maximise sales and profitabilites
•Maintaining good relationships with vendors, medias/publishers to ensure good collaboration in marketing activities 
•Maintaining effective reporting channels and keeping track of timelines
•Preforming other tasks as assigned by Management
Job Requirement:
•Proven experiences in Marketing or similar role 
•Minimum Bachelor’s Degree
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•Strong research and analytical skills to forecast and identify trends and challenges 
•Familiarity with online marketing platforms 
•Strong organizational and time-management abilities 
•Good communication and people skills 
•Willingness to participate in networking, business and social events outside of regular working hours
•Able to work under pressure and meet deadlines
•Good working attitude, independent, and creative
•Good computer skills, and good knowledge of office 365
•Fluent in both written and spoken of Khmer and English language.
Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com 22nd Floor, Diamond Twin Tower, Koh Pich, Sangkat Tonle Bassac Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 081 990 959

PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
** Job purpose
this position will be responsible for supporting Finance Manager in dealing with tax issue. The position also requires to train and coach Accounting Assistant and accountant in responsible company.

** Duties and responsibilities
•	Review all accounting activities and ensure all accounting transaction records are maintain in compliance with accounting policies and procedure and tax
•	Prepares monthly and annual tax return, ensures that it complies with Cambodia taxation laws and regulations
•	Reconciles all taxes, ensures correct payments and complies with Cambodian taxation laws
•	Deals with external auditors 
•	Deals with tax officer for both interim and comprehensive audit from tax department during tax audit
•	 Initiate the internal control to minimize risk
•	Review and coordinate all contracts relevant to tax application
•	Work with accounting staff on tax accounting issues
•	Work with other related authorities to setup company’s compliance
•	Perform other tasks required by Managers
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting and Finance, or related field
•	Minimum 3 to 5 years’ experience in dealing with tax audit from General Department of Taxation 
•	 Capacity to work in teams, as well as taking own initiatives
•	 Effective Communication
•	 Knowledge of computer accounting system- Quickbook
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
- ធ្វើការណាត់ជួប និងទៅជួបអតិថិជនគោលដៅរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការជាចាំបាច់។

- ត្រូវចេះរៀបចំកាលវិភាគការងារ ចេះធ្វើរផែនការណ៏ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ និងប្រចាំខែ។
- ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ អតិថិជន និងត្រូវចេះថែរក្សា អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ទំនាក់ទំនងអោយបានកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។
- ចេះធ្វើរបាយការណ៏ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ របាយការណ៏ការងារសង្ខេបប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ និងរបាយការណ៏ការងារសរុបប្រចាំខែ។ 
- អនុវត្តន៍ផ្សេងទៀតដែលចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង។

• Being responsible, reliable, resourceful, creative, friendly, and dynamic.
• Seeking long-term career.

• Working knowledge of public health problems and treatment.

Job Description: We are looking for artistic, detail-oriented candidates with good interpersonal skills for the position of Graphic Designer. The primary objective of the Graphic Designer includes the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including illustrations, logos, layouts... Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design.YOUR RESPONSABILITIES :• Study design briefs and determine requirements• Conceptualize visuals based on requirements• Prepare rough drafts and present ideas• Develop illustrations, logos and other designs using software • Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic• Work with creative director to produce final design

Job Description:
• Develop and oversee the implementation of the company’s recruitment strategy to ensure that staffing needs are met
• Work closely with HoDs and Hiring Managers to identify the headcounts and prepare an annual recruitment plan for each business unit
• Supervise the process for the placing of advertisements for all internal and external vacancies.
• Establish and maintain systems for recruitment marketing in order to establish Camfone as an employer of choice
• Interview potential recruits and appoint staff in consultation with the appropriate line managers. and selection process, including arranging tests and providing suitable arrangements for applicants with special needs.
• Develop a manpower pulling program with some universities if needed
• Develop and execute various orientation programs for new employees and provide assistance to understand all job responsibilities and company policies and procedures
• Develop a training policy, procedure, and strategy to support the company’s business and to ensure that employees have the necessary skills to meet their objectives and the opportunity to develop to the maximum of their potential.
• Ensure that employees are appropriately motivated and trained to be able to carry out their responsibilities to the required standards.
• Undertake regular assessments of training needs and develop a program to meet identified needs.
• Maintain close communication with managers and staff to discuss training needs and to ensure that they are fully aware of training opportunities available.
• Keep managers and staff informed of internal and external training and development opportunities.
• Arrange internal training and development program, using external consultants as required to meet identified training needs.
• Develop and monitor the company’s training budget to ensure that the best quality of training and development is provided within the established budget.
• Oversee the development of effective processes for the evaluation of all training and development provided.
• Maintain an awareness of developments in the training and development field to ensure that the company continues to take advantage of best practice.
• Oversee the maintenance of all necessary training and development records.
• Admin support
• Manage stationary 
• Purchase order 
• Quote price 
• To do a weekly, monthly, and yearly HR&Admin reports and regularly submit to HR Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in HR, Business Administration or other related fields
• Effective Communication and Facilitation Skills
• At least 2-year experience in HR 
• HR technical skills
• Good command of English language
• Good team-building skills
• Good negotiating skills
• Good organizing skills
• A deep understanding of the recruitment policy, procedure and process
• Ability to identify potential candidates and recruit the right people
• Ability to build good relationships with others 
• Ability to deal with different people in a professional manner
• Ability to manage multi tasks with effective and efficient results
