Job Description:
•	Files federal, state, and local tax documents by preparing property tax returns, state pages, and federal, state, and municipal returns, extensions, and quarterly payments.
•	Prepares tax provision schedules by reviewing, preparing, and consolidating provision schedules.
•	Recommends tax strategies by researching federal, state, and local taxation issues.
•	Maintains legislative materials by reviewing, interpreting, and implementing new or revised laws.
•	Maintains compliance with regulations by forwarding required information to federal, state, and local authorities.
•	Revises procedures by developing and streamlining procedures and worksheets for calculation of tax provisions.
•	Identifies profitability of potential mergers and acquisitions by analyzing tax information; calculating key ratios; identifying areas of tax savings.
•	Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations.
•	Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance, general business or related field.•	At least 3 years working experience in related field.•	Very good in Excel, quick book •	Strong understanding in Cambodia Tax regulation•	Experience in Monthly and Yearly tax declaration •	knowledge of general accounting procedures•	knowledge of relevant accounting software•	proficient in data entry and management•	Understand well about Annual Tax, TOP and CIF, COP, SOP and VOP

Job Description:
** KEY RESPONSIBILITY AREAS 
- Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
- Organize learning material and resources.
- Creates, modifies and keep learning records of the students.
- Work with other teachers for the development of teaching and students learning.
- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods (songs, stories, media, structured games, art, outdoor etc.) to motivate and stimulate children’s abilities.
- Assess students’ performance and progress to ensure they are mastering skills on regular basis.
- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
- Cooperate with administration staff.
- Follow and comply with teaching standards and safety regulations.
- Administration
- Prepare and submit monthly plan, daily lesson plan with clear objectives and make sure that all necessary materials for teaching are available.
- Design and create visual teaching materials such as posters, flashcards and other visual aids to support teaching
- Maintain teaching resources in stock by ordering ahead of time
- Report any damages or losses of the classrooms inventories to school principal.
- Participate in school meetings, parent meetings and professional development activities
- Provide classroom decorations to make it more interesting and make sure classroom are clean and child friendly.

** Other responsibilities:
- Ensure children are always protected from physical, emotional and sexual abuse, and report any mistreatment or abuse of children.
- Follow other duties as reasonably required by management.
Job Requirement:
** Desired qualifications
- Passionate about teaching and love working with young children
- University degree in education at least one year teaching experience.
- Love and value teaching career
- Desire to teach kids or young English learners and adults
- Excellent interpersonal skill to liaison with other relevant staff within Polymath International Academy
- Possess professional attitude and diligence able to work independently as well as work in a team
- Being responsible, reliable, resourceful, creative, friendly, and dynamic.
- Computer literacy Ms. Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and internet. 

** Application Information
All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply, please send your CV, Cover Letter and required files to email in the contact detail provided below or drop them directly to our office before the deadline of the application. Only shortlisted candidates are contacted for the interview. 
- Contact : 092 79 30 33/ 010 79 30 33
- Email	: polymathpia01@gmail.com 
- Address : #04, Street 107BT, Chamroeunphal Village, Sangkat Boeng Tompon, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh.	 
- Facebook : Polymath International Academy 
- Deadline: 25th February, 2021

- Create and mark exams and record the result to the report book

job title: គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាចិន (Chinese Teacher) ( 2 Positions)
position: គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាចិន (Chinese Teacher) ( 2 Positions)
Job Description:
- មានចំណង់ចំណូលចិត្តធ្វើការជាមួយកុមារ អត់ធ្មត់ និង ច្នៃប្រឌិត
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ អ៊ីនធឺណែត អ៊ីម៉ែល និង MS Office
- កត់ត្រា និងរៀបចំ ផែនការមេរៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និង សប្តាហ៏ ហើយអនុវត្តវាឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- រៀបចំសៀវភៅតាមដានការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សរៀងរាល់ខែ និង ត្រីមាស
- ផ្តល់ជំនួយដល់សិស្សនូវរាល់តំរូវការក្នុងការសិក្សារបស់ពួកគេ

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 jobs@smart.com.kh No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh  010202136

Job Description:
To conduct planning, operations, securing and maintenance of Operation Support Systems to ensure continuous application of relevant business flows, including handling of Change Management Processes, Workforce Management and other workflows to ensure continuous improvement of the processes and further development of the OSS to achieve better overall performance.
- To conduct planning and configuration of OSS to meet operational and business needs.
- To perform preventive and corrective maintenance on OSS.
- To define and implement Change Management and Workforce Management processes to ensure smooth operations and overall continuous improvement of processes.
- To recommend development and changes to the OSS to achieve improved performance.
- To define performance metrics for monitoring and evaluation of OSS performance.
- To work with internal and external stakeholders to ensure smooth operations.
- To work with other relevant parties on the interfacing and interaction of OSS with other platforms
Job Requirement:
•	End to End Technical View (Foundational): Knowledge and ability to understand the telecommunications industry, the end to end architecture, value chain, systems and interconnect/inter-operation including process flows from customer to service in support of service delivery and the services from the customer demands to the delivery, in the context of your domain of expertise.
•	Change Management (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to define and manage processes for deploying and integrating new digital capabilities into the business in a way that is sensitive to and fully compatible with business operations.
•	Quality Assurance (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to ensure that the agreed quality standards within an organisation are adhered to and that best practice is promulgated throughout the organisation.
•	Process Improvement (Foundational): Knowledge and ability to understand business processes, improve internal Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and methods to make the unit more efficient
•	Networks and service platform engineering (Foundational): Knowledge and ability to implement networks and service platforms based on given architecture
•
•	Operations and Maintenance (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to maintain telecommunications systems and equipment to ensure effective operational performance and continuity of service

General skills
•	Communication Skills (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to impart or exchange information by verbal, written or other means
•	Problem Solving (Troubleshooting) (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to analyse problems, identify the root cause, establish cause-and-effect linkages and propose solutions
•	
•	Analytical Ability (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to understand, evaluate, interpret and analyse data
•	
•	Digital Literacy (Intermediate): Knowledge and ability to make use of digital technology in support of work functions

Job Description: Building and managing cyber assurance and vulnerability management, performing security controls assessments, vulnerability assessment, remediation management, penetration testing, and risk assessment.•Develop and maintain vulnerability management standards, processes, and guidelines•Develop and maintained vulnerability assessment and pen testing calendar•Perform vulnerability assessment and pen testing (IT/Telco network, operating system, database, and mobile application)•Analyze vulnerabilities assessment results, recommend remediation and mitigation strategies•Performing forensic and analyze incident investigation•Identify false positives and risk acceptance candidates•Clearly understand and communicate risks associated with vulnerabilities•Perform Red Team adversary simulation activities, applying attacker tools, tactics, and procedures in a safe and controlled manner.•Conduct logical security audits and hands-on technical security evaluations•Develop subject matter expertise in focused areas of security•Implement and manage tools (SIEM, SOC, CDP, EDR, PAM/PIM, Nessus, Metaplot, Nexpose, …)•Maintaining, coordination and evaluation incident management via SOC/EDR between SOC/EDR vendor and incident response owner for the remediation•Develop and maintaining up to date remediation tracking of incident identified via SOC•Develop deliverable reporting on vulnerability remediation progress.•Conduct research on current vulnerabilities and exploits using publicly available, trusted resources and other finished vulnerability products
Job Requirement: •University degree in Information Technology, Cyber Security, Computer science or related field.•Strong analytical and problem solving skill.•Minimum 3 years of experience in IT Security field, experience in developing and administering an Information Security policies and procedure.•Proficiency understanding the technical architecture of IT/Telco systems built using Windows, UNIX, Linux, IBM AIX, VMware, Citrix, Oracle and MySQL, GSM platforms.•Good in English, both written and spoken.•Self-confident and able to work in a team.

Job Description: • Work with the design team to fully understand the shop drawings and production drawings• Ensure that all the MEP confirmed drawings are accompanied with detailed list of MEP material specifications, for instance, functional design, sizes and shapes• Ensure that the MEP engineers responsible for building know the MEP drawing that assigned to them with absolute clarity with all the details and particularity and peculiarity accounted for• Assist site MEP engineers and MEP foremen with technical advice and administrative support• Ensure strict and correct translation of MEP drawings into construction on site• Work in close collaboration with MEP foremen to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the MEP Material installation methods• Organize and conduct project meetings for critical MEP activities• Assist the MEP engineers in their coordination and relation with the subcontractors and vendors• Collaborate with the procurement team for periodical review and update of the material order plan to ensure effective purchase order of MEP material• Intervene when there are conflicts between MEP engineers and subcontractors or vendors• Coordinate vendors’ work to ensure smooth site work progress and ensure that no one team’s work is held up by other teams• Supervise the sub-contractors’ and venders’ work to ensure order and safety at the construction site• Maintain staff’s performance by counseling and disciplining via planning, monitoring, and appraising job results• Advise/steer the company toward new construction technology• Advise the company on key construction personnel selection• Advise the procurement team of potential MEP material suppliers

Job Description: Purpose of job:Ensure all IT systems operate 24x7 with minimum possible interruptions. Monitor and pro-actively support the systems. Initiate timely expansion, optimization, and upgrades of the systems.• Administration, configuration, and maintenance of Windows and Linux OS;  • Maintaining of diagrams of the entrusted systems; • Administration of virtualized environment (VMware, Huawei FusionSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V, Oracle VM); • Periodical backup and restoration of server systems;  • Setting up monitoring of server performance (processor, memory, hard drives etc); • Setting up monitoring of applications uptime and accessibility; • Daily tracking of RRD graphs for servers load, checking hardware alarm and applying preventing measures to mitigate possible problems;  • Submission of failed and broken units (servers, storages etc) under warranty to suppliers, coordination with service partners; • Maintain servers and storages in terms of hardware installation and asset tracking; • Support and mitigate or/and close the discovered system vulnerabilities;  • Support on periodical operating systems patch update • Other relevant tasks assigned by the cloud infrastructure manager, the head of Infrastructure, and the CTO.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degree in IT• 2 years of working experience with Linux and Windows OS, server hardware • Perfect TCP/IP knowledge; • Knowledge of SAN and NAS storages connection principles; Proactive, energetic, self confident, Self-starter• Good in English, both written and spoken • Able to work under pressure• Hands-on experience with Linux and Windows OS• Hands-on experience in SAN storages operation and management.

Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 jobs@smart.com.kh Phnom Penh No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh  010202136

Job Description:
+ Job Responsibiliies 
1. Strategy creation and planning
- Strategics and develop digital marketing plan as part of    the overall go to market strategy
- Take the lead to achieve integrated marketing approach
- Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns
- Create positive synergy between “media buy agency”, “social media management agency” and “website development agency”
- Manage the process of planning, execution and delivery to ensure that campaigns are delivered on time, on budget and within scope to customer expectation of quality including monitoring and bench-marking of KPIs and performance measurement 
- Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels
- Effectively use the existing and develop new digital partnerships to maximize Smart’s online presence and customer engagement.

2. Digital execution:
+ Media Buy:
- Manage and plan digital marketing budget
- Plan and create innovative ideas and creative content for effective digital media placement to drive engagement
- Identify trends and insights and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
- Explore and execute creative campaigns to position Smart and the leader in digital sphere
- Review (stay up to date) new ways of advertising to keep Smart as the forefront of developments in digital marketing.
+ Social Media:
- Plan and create creative content to drive engagement on social media
- Plan campaigns to drive brand/product awareness and positioning
- Identify trends and insights and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
- Actively engage in social media to understand and engage conversations with the consumers for better insights on consumer’s opinion on the brand/products
- Review new technologies (features) to keep Smart as the forefront of developments in social media.
+ Website:
- Managing the redesign of Smart’s websites to improve the usability, design, content and conversions
- Derive strategy to drive online traffic to Smart’s websites
- Track conversion rate and visitor’s reports to make improvements to the websites.
Job Requirement:
+ Job Requirements 
- Bachelor’s degree in project management, business/marketing or a related field is preferred.
- Having experience in working with digital agency or content development companies is a plus.
- Being a social Media/Digital Savvy
- Young in heart and easily adapt to change
- Being a Trend setters
- Demonstrating good leadership and time management skills with willingness to learn and promote Smart as a brand
- Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to communicate effectively with staff, at all levels, and third parties
- Ability to demonstrate a high level of verbal and written English
- Being proficient at producing and presenting reports.

Job Description:
• Drive the sales to achieve the individual sales target in own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of customers, revenue, sales growth, availability, visibility and customer price of products are achieved within the area.
• Manage the implementation of brand, trade and sales area programs and the localized activities.
• Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximize revenues, client and share performance.
• Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely retailers, wholesalers, depots, craftsman and roll-formers, in order to gain high level of support and their loyalty.
• Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with retailer, wholesaler, depot, craftsman, and roll former to provide on job coaching and motivate to drive achievement of targets.
• Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decision and panning.
• Ensure all area activities are complied to ISI Steel code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.
• Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.
• Carry out any other tasks as directed by senior management.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor's degree in sales or marketing  
• 1 year experience in territory sales representative or construction material is a plus.
• Good command in English both speaking and writing.
• Able to use Ms office, internet and E-mail.

• Annual Performance Bonus
• Learning and Development

• Coffee and fruit serve

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  010-484-535 /092-484-535 recruitment@isisteel.com.kh Phum Tropang Thloeung, St,Veng Sreng ,Sangkat Chaom Chao, Khan Phor Sen Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010-484-535 /092-484-535

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
Work on the project planning to ensure all product schedules are following their developments each step of the way from product design to product prototype and samples as well as the final production stage
    Develop and monitor budget for project implementation and production
    Coordinate and negotiate with suppliers and all stakeholders to meet the company’s expectation and deadline including launch dates
    Conduct surveys of customer satisfaction, if necessary, on the new product and provide recommendation based on surveys
    Update reporting and concerns from all stakeholders including but not limited to brewery, supplier, and steering committee members.
    Manage the entire product launch process from briefing to creative agency to the commercial launch of new product
    Identify new opportunities for the business to expand new product in market
    To work closely with many stakeholders including internal brewery team as well as external suppliers both local and abroad.
    To understand both the production process (technical requirements) and commercial process.
    Work under integrated marketing manager and ensure a timely launch date
Job Requirement:
Bachelor’s degree in Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Management, Marketing, or related field. Advanced degree or MBA preferred.
    Certification in related discipline preferred (e.g., Certified in Production & Inventory Management Certification or Project Management Certified, Green Belt Certified)
    At least 7 years of experience in development and introduction of new products into supply chain, branding, and/or related area.
    Experience in the NPI process preferably within international FMCG.
    Experience in multiples areas of FMCG (Sourcing, Manufacturing, Planning and/or Distribution preferred).
    Recognized as an expert in own area with specialized depth and breadth of expertise within area of work in the organization
    Experience in preparing for and presenting project status to executive leadership, including the development, and managing of dashboards.
    Knowledge of beverages production process and supply chain management is a plus.
    Technical understanding of manufacturing engineering, design for manufacturability, design and process excellence methodologies including Six Sigma, Environment Health & Safety guidelines, supplier development and process validation.
    Advanced communication skills: facilitation, interpersonal, writing (reporting), visual and presentation, and active listening.
    Strong collaborator and communicator with a high degree of emotional intelligence and the ability to understand business partner needs and manage satisfaction relative to deliverables.
    Ability to negotiate with and influence key stakeholders across the organization
    Analytical skills: creative & critical thinking, system thinking, problem solving.
    Able to handle stress and pressure with Emotional Intelligent
    Be the role model for the team

job title: Chinese Teacher (Phnom Penh and Siem Reap Campus)
position: Chinese Teacher (Phnom Penh and Siem Reap Campus)
Job Description:
•	Organize and lead activities designed to promote physical, mental and social development
•	Teach basic skills such as color, shape, number and letter recognition, personal hygiene, and social skills
•	Observe and evaluate children's performance, behavior, social development, and physical health
•	Provide a variety of materials and resources for children to explore, manipulate and use
•	Assimilate arriving children to the school environment by greeting them, helping them remove outerwear, and selecting activities of interest to them
•	Prepare materials and classrooms for class activities;
•	Establish clear objectives for all lessons and communicate those objectives to children
•	Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students' varying needs and interests
•	Arrange indoor and outdoor space to facilitate creative play, motor-skill activities, and safety
•	Prepare reports on students and activities as required by administration
•	Administer tests to help determine children's developmental levels, needs, and potential
•	Supervise, evaluate, and plan assignments for teacher assistants and volunteers
•	Perform other tasks assigned by upper manager
Job Requirement:
•	Degree in the field of Chinese teaching for Teachers of Chinese or related fields
•	At least One-year experience in teaching Chinese
•	Respect and supporting AG Education’s values and mission
•	Six months to one year work-related experience in education
•	Good command of Chinese
•	Computer literacy: Ms. Word, Ms. Excel a plus
•	Good communication, interpersonal, and customer-service skill
•	Ability to create teaching aids
•	Ability to work well independently as well as part of a team
How to Apply
Competitive salary and please state your salary expectation! Company Profile: Cambo Technology (I.S.P) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 by a group of experienced business and I.T. executives to offer local clients with computer solutions and broadband internet services.To facilitate more focused business development as an Internet service Provider, the Company changed to its present name in October 2007. job title: 人事行政专员（HZDS）：HR & Admin Officer
company_name: Peak Capital Management Co., Ltd (鼎盛资本管理有限公司)
position: 人事行政专员（HZDS）：HR & Admin Officer
Job Description:
1. 根据公司的需求发布招聘信息、筛选应聘人员资料；
2. 根据公司要求，监督员工考勤、审核和办理请休假手续，并及时与总部进行有效对接；
3. 组织、安排应聘人员的面试；即时对员工的社保办理、薪酬福利等各类诉求进行初期办理；
4. 办理员工入职、试用、转正、调动、离职等异动手续及考评、行政人事档案管理工作；
5. 负责公司人员出差车票、机票及酒店预订，负责公司内部跨部门会议内部跨部门会议等活动的组织；
6. 负责日常办公用品采购、发放、登记管理，办公室设备及固定资产的管理；
7. 公司内部文件，档案，规章制度等文件的起草完善，合同文件档案等内部资料收集，保管；
8. 协助对接政府主管部门、证监会、银行等合作机构；
9. 完成上级交办的其它事项。
Job Requirement:
1、 柬籍，具备中文的沟通能力，具备英文沟通能力者优先；
2、 大专以上学历优先；
3、 2年以上相关工作经验；
4、 熟悉Windows、MS Office；
5、 具有较强的沟通能力，做事细致，能完成多项任务，能满足紧张的工作进度；
6、 注重细节，执行力强，职业素质高。

2、协助总经理调查研究、了解投资方向，并提出处理意见或建议，供集团领导决策；
3、协助总经理作好经营服务各项管理并督促、检查落实贯彻执行情况；
4、负责各类文件的分类呈送，请集团领导阅批并转有关部门处理。
Job Requirement:
1、中国台湾籍男士为佳；
2、会开车；
3、工商管理、金融经济、市场营销等相关等专业毕业，5年以上工作经验；
4、有较强的组织、协调、沟通、领导能力及人际交往能力以及敏锐的洞察力，具有很强的判断与决策能力，计划和执行能力；
5、良好的团队协作精神，为人诚实可靠、品行端正。

Prepare relevant documents, keep records and other jobs as assigned by Supervisor and/or Admin Manager 5.	Others jobs as assigned by Line Manager/Management

Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី: 
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើដំណើរការការងារទូទៅក្រុមជាងដែក នៃផ្នែកផលិតកម្មទូទៅ 
ទំហំការងារ:
• រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការ ការងារ និងអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព។
• អនុវត្តផែនការ ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។
• អនុវត្តផែនការដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។ 
• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សានិងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើ
មកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (11. My General Productions)។
• រៀងរាល់ចុងម៉ោងពេលរសៀលត្រូវសរសេររបាយការណ៍ការងារប្រចំាថ្ងៃ ផ្ញើនៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (11. My General Productions) និងតាមដានផែនការងារដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• រៀងរាល់ចុងខែត្រូវបញ្ជូនរបាយការណ៍ការងារសរុបប្រចាំ មកជំនួយការប្រធានផ្នែក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាពស្អាត។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោង។
• ចូលរួមសហការការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់ រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃពេលមានតម្រូវការងារពីថ្នាក់លើ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ឬអនុប្រធានផ្នែក ។

បញ្ជាក់៖
• ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអតចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់ មិនលម្អៀងរួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។
• ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។
• ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឃប់ពីការងារ។
• ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។
• ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្អាត។

• លក្ខខណ្ឌការងារ
• ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការសន្សុំ សំចៃខ្ពស់។ 
• គោរពពេលវេលា (ម៉ោងចូល ម៉ោងចេញ និងម៉ោងសម្រាកញុំាអាហារ)។
• ត្រូវអនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់របស់ស្ថាប័នឱ្យបានល្អ។
• នៅពេលបំពេញការងារត្រូវស្លៀកពាក់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារជានិច្ច។
• បំពេញការងារអស់ពីកំលាំងកាយចិត្ត និងមានចិត្តចេះជួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗជានិច្ច។
• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពសាលា។
• ត្រូវពាក់មួកសុវត្ថិភាពជានិច្ច (ធ្វើដំណើរមកកន្លែងធ្វើការ ឬត្រឡប់ទៅផ្ទះវិញ)។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ដែលសាលាផ្តល់ជូន។

** ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើន ជូនដល់បុគ្គលិករបស់ខ្លួន ដែលក្នុងនោះរួមមាន៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  ប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៏ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ
Job Requirement:
** ការសិក្សា:
• បញ្ចប់ ថ្នាក់ទី07 ឡើង
** ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:
• លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ និងជំនាញ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវ លើការផលិត និងជួសជុល សម្ភារពីដែក។ 
• ការយល់ច្បាស់ពីប្រភេទសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់។ 
• ការងារធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។
• ត្រូវចេះប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយ។
• ការងារធ្វើតែមួយដង។
• ការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងនីមួយៗ។
• រក្សាសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបំពេញការងារ និងក្រោយពេលធ្វើរួច។
• ការពារសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ។
• ចេះសរសេរអក្សរ និងអានបានល្អ។
• ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។
** តម្រូវការការងារ :
• អាកប្បកិរិយាថ្លៃថ្នូរ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់។
• ភាពវិជ្ជមាន ការបើកចិត្តឱ្យទូលាយ និងចែករំលែកបទពិសោធន៍។ 
• មានរបៀបរៀបរយ មានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងមានទំនុកចិត្តលើខ្លួនឯង។
• មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ និងការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់។
• មានភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត និងបង្កើតគំនិតថ្មីៗ។
• ចេះគោរពអ្នកដទៃ និងគោរពគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក។
• ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចេះជួយអ្នកដទៃ។
• អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងសកម្មភាពរហ័សរហួន។
• មានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ និងប្រើប្រាស់ពាក្យសម្តីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ។
• មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងសហការការងារបានល្អ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

job title: បុគ្គលិកស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត (Internship Teller)
position: បុគ្គលិកស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត (Internship Teller)
Location: Banteay Meanchey，Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Chhnang，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Kep，Phnom Penh，Prey Veng，Pursat，Siem Reap，Svay Rieng，Takhmao，Tboung Khmum
Job Description:
- ជាសិស្សដែលបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬនិស្សិតដែលកំពុងសិក្សានៅតាមសកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់នឹងការងារ
- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ តស៊ូក្នុងការងារ
- មិនចាំបាច់មានបទពិសោធន៍
Job Requirement: ** បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ក៏អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងច្បាប់ថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ (បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ​ រួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចម្រើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ឬទូរស័ព្ទៈ ០៧០ ៩៦០​ ៦៦៦ Email: Job@chamroeun.com
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Nhong Korane  070 960 666 job@chamroeun.com No.425, St. 271, Sangkat Tour Tom Pong II, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 960 666

Job Description:
Work closely with Head of Provincial Office in setting annual plan, budget, and strategies for each staff under supervision.  
•	Be responsible for providing on job training and capacity building program to subordinates to effectively handle their job assignments to at least meet minimum performance standards expected.
•	Regularly review branch performance against planning, budget, and set performance standards and timely take corrective actions as necessary. 
•	Participate General Management Team and Branch Management Team as well as perform regular Branch Staff Meeting to review and reflect the level of achievements, identity implementation gaps and problems and challenges encountered, and come up with possible initiatives to fill up such gaps identified and effectively address those encountered challenges and problems;
•	Be responsible for providing orientation on JDs, KPIs, and POAs for all branch staff.
•	Take necessary actions to continuously improve fraud prevention and detection.
•	Be responsible for all loans made by the branch; ensure that all processes and procedures are fully followed and that all loan documents are accurately completed.   
•	Be responsible for monitoring and evaluating the progress of overall branch performance and by staff such as trends of active borrowers, gross loan portfolio, loan disbursement, status of cross-financing and PAR and regularly conduct the analysis on results to see if corrective actions are needed to fully achieve the annual targets set and/or revert the performance to get back on track.
•	Review and approve all expenses at the branch level in accordance with the finance and accounting policies and procedures. 
•	Build team performance under his/her supervision.
Job Requirement:
-	Education – Bachelor’s degree in Finance and Banking, Accounting, Business Administrative, or other related fields.
-	Experience – At least 5 years of credit management and or financial management experience in MFIs / Bank sector. 
-	Knowledge – Good understanding of Cambodia microfinance industry.

Job Description:
1.	ធ្វើការស្វែងយល់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ពីគោលការណ៍ និងនិតិវិធីរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន 
2.	ចូលរួមរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត និងផែនការអាជីវកម្មរបស់សាខា
3.	ដឹកនាំ ចាត់ចែង ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ ប្រតិបត្តិការរបស់បុគ្គលិកក្រោមការគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់ខ្លួន 
4.	អប់រំ និងតម្រង់ទិសមន្រ្តីឥណទានក្រោមការគ្រប់គ្រង ដើម្បីធានាឲ្យមានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ 
5.	ការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំផ្ទាល់ ក្នុង ក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចំរើន
Job Requirement:
1.	ត្រូវយល់ដឹងពីគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធី សេចក្តីសម្រេច និងសេចក្តីណែនាំនានារបស់ចំរើន
2.	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅចាប់ពីកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើង ឬសញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល ក្នុង ជំនាញគណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ វិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសេដ្ឋកិច្ច និងការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល។
3.	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារក្នុងវិស័យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ យ៉ាងតិចបី(០3)ឆ្នាំ
